### Common Workout Mistakes People Make

Workout routines can be a great way to stay fit and healthy, but many people make common mistakes that can hinder their progress. Here are some of the most frequent errors to avoid:

#### Ignoring Progress Tracking
Tracking your progress is crucial for staying motivated and seeing improvements. Make sure to log your workouts, track your weight, and monitor your fitness goals. This will help you stay on track and make adjustments as needed.

#### Overeating Before Workouts
Eating a large meal before a workout can lead to discomfort and reduced performance. Instead, opt for a light snack or a protein shake about an hour before your workout to keep your energy levels up.

#### Proper Hydration
Hydration is essential for optimal performance. Drink plenty of water throughout the day, but avoid excessive amounts, especially before a workout. Dehydration can impair your workout and overall health.

#### No Alcohol
Alcohol can interfere with your workout performance and recovery. It can also affect your sleep, which is crucial for muscle recovery and overall fitness.

#### Posture
Maintaining good posture during workouts is important for preventing injuries and ensuring you get the most out of your exercises. Pay attention to your form, especially when lifting weights or doing high-impact activities.

#### Not Working Out on an Empty Stomach
Eating a small snack or protein shake before a workout can help fuel your muscles and prevent cramps. Avoid working out on an empty stomach, as it can lead to fatigue and reduced performance.

#### Stretching
Incorporating stretching into your warm-up and cool-down routines can help prevent injuries and improve flexibility. Spend a few minutes stretching before and after your workouts to keep your muscles loose and ready for action.

By avoiding these common mistakes, you can enhance your workout experience and achieve better results. Remember to stay consistent and listen to your body. Happy exercising!
</response>

Singles’ Day is China’s spending event of the year, with sales reaching a record $115 billion in 2020.

As consumers shop, ecommerce employees and delivery companies work overtime to keep the spree going.

Distribution centers bear the brunt of the workload and have to move billions of packages in days.

Singles’ Day proper started in China on Thursday, marking the beginning of the country’s largest online spending fest.

While this year’s event included a discount period on November 1, the true 24-hour sales frenzy traditionally launches on November 11, when consumers flood online shopping platforms like Alibaba’s Taobao and its rival JD.com.

Despite a crackdown this year from Beijing on lavish spending and consumer waste, reports creeping in from local media indicate Singles’ Day is still going strong, with 382 brands each hitting $15 million in sales since the start of this year’s event.

Creating engaging YouTube titles is crucial for capturing viewers' attention and driving traffic to your channel. ### How It Works

StoryLab.ai’s YouTube Title Generator uses advanced algorithms to analyze your video content and suggest relevant, engaging titles. Simply upload your video, and the tool will generate a list of potential titles based on keywords, trending topics, and viewer preferences. You can then review and refine the suggestions to find the perfect title for your video.

### Why Good Titles Matter

A well-crafted title can significantly impact your video’s performance. According to YouTube, the first 60 characters of a title are the most important for search rankings. A compelling title not only grabs viewers’ attention but also helps your video appear in relevant search results. By using the StoryLab.ai Title Generator, you can ensure your titles are optimized for search and engagement.

### How It Saves Time

Using the StoryLab.ai Title Generator can save you a significant amount of time. Instead of spending hours brainstorming and testing different titles, you can quickly generate a list of options and choose the best one. This saves you time and allows you to focus on other aspects of your channel, such as content creation and promotion.

### Get Started for Free

Ready to get started? Sign up for a free account on StoryLab.ai and start generating titles today. With our user-friendly interface and powerful algorithms, you’ll be on your way to creating engaging titles in no time.

### AI Uses GPT-3 Training for Quality Suggestions

StoryLab.ai’s Title Generator leverages the latest advancements in AI, including GPT-3 training, to ensure that the suggested titles are high-quality and relevant. GPT-3, a state-of-the-art language model, helps the tool understand the nuances of language and generate titles that resonate with your audience.

gts:
InPoker announces partnership with DareNFT, an NFT 2.0 protocol that brings innovation to the world of digital assets InPoker Nov 23, 2021·2 min read

InPoker and DareNFT are pleased to announce they have entered into a strategic partnership to combine DareNFT’s innovative NFT ecosystem with InPoker ambitious e-sports vision.

DareNFT is an universal NFT 2.0 protocol for digital assets. DareNFT has developed a suite of products to address some of the challenges in the NFT landscape, including unrecognized benefits between NFTs, unrecognized relationships between NFT owners and hidden risks of NFT ownership. There are many content types out there and whereas the content types matter at application level, the licensing protocol layer is the same for all of them. Therefore, there is only one protocol needed to serve all.

The existing licencing processes of derivative content are mostly manual and time consuming. With an NFT 2.0 smart contract, these processes can be automated. Derivative content such as: song remixes, subtitled videos, edited images, learning contents, translated book often generates revenue from the rental and subscription business model. Creators can receive royalties from reproducer’s revenue via the NFT smart contract. This speeds up collaboration and sharing of benefits between the author and re-publisher, resulting in more income for both parties.

The advent of the NFT 2.0 protocol that DareNFT proposes can mark a new milestone for nonfungible tokens and the crypto market in general. The platform’s competitive advantage is its ability to adapt to emerging trends, banking on its NFT 2.0 protocol which is an essential element for building a thriving platform.

DareNFT will provide InPoker with the access to its ecosystem and the NFT marketplace where InPoker plans to list some of the Elite NFT membership cards. This long-term partnership marks a significant milestone in InPoker’s efforts to introduce the cutting edge technologies to online gaming.

Visit DareNFT: https://darenft.com/

Stay tuned for more exciting developments on https://www.inpoker.io

Join our official Telegram Channel here: https://t.me/influencerpoker

Sure! Here’s a concise article about long-term care insurance (LTCI) claims and how they compare to Medicare Advantage (MA) options, focusing on the 55-year-old couple stats ($2,000–$4,000 range) and the Scott Graham photo:

---

**Long-Term Care Insurance Claims and Medicare Advantage Options: A Comparison**

When considering long-term care insurance (LTCI) or Medicare Advantage (MA) plans, it's crucial to understand the differences and how they might impact your financial planning. For a 55-year-old couple, the cost range for LTCI claims is typically between $2,000 and $4,000. This range can vary based on individual circumstances and the specific policy terms.

**LTCI Claims:**
LTCI policies are designed to cover the costs of long-term care services, such as nursing home care, home health care, and assisted living. The premiums for these policies can be quite high, but they offer significant financial protection for the future. For a couple, the average annual premium for a $200,000 benefit could range from $2,000 to $4,000, depending on the policy terms and the insurer.

**Medicare Advantage (MA) Options:**
Medicare Advantage plans are private health insurance plans that offer the same benefits as traditional Medicare, but they are administered by private companies. MA plans can include additional benefits like vision, dental, and hearing care, and they often have lower premiums than traditional Medicare. However, the cost of long-term care services is typically covered by Medicare Part A (hospital insurance) and Part B (medical insurance), which can be more cost-effective than paying out-of-pocket.

**Why These Stats Matter:**
For buyers of LTCI, understanding the cost range is essential because it helps them budget for potential long-term care expenses. If the cost of care exceeds the policy’s coverage, the policyholder may need to pay out-of-pocket, which can be financially burdensome. For MA buyers, knowing the cost range can help them understand the potential out-of-pocket expenses for long-term care services, which are typically covered by Medicare.

Sure! Here are the top 5 health benefits of cosmetic dentistry for Missouri City residents:

1. **Preventing Gum Disease Through Corrected Alignment**: Crooked teeth can trap food particles and plaque, leading to gum disease. By correcting the alignment, you reduce the risk of gum inflammation and infection.

2. **Improved Digestion From Better Bite Function**: A proper bite helps in chewing food more efficiently, which can improve digestion and reduce the strain on your digestive system.

3. **Reduced Risk of Tooth Decay Via Fissure Sealing**: Fissure sealing is a procedure where a protective coating is applied to the grooves in your back teeth. This helps prevent cavities by sealing out food particles and plaque.

4. **Enhanced Speech Clarity**: Misaligned teeth can affect your speech, making it difficult to pronounce certain sounds clearly. Correcting the alignment can improve your speech clarity and confidence.

5. **Long-Term Oral Health Maintenance**: Regular cosmetic dental work can help maintain your overall oral health by preventing issues that could lead to more serious problems in the future.

These benefits make cosmetic dentistry not just about looks, but a crucial step in maintaining your oral health and overall well-being.
</response>

Sure, here is a structured version of the article:

### Why Website Optimization Matters

Website optimization is crucial for small businesses looking to improve their online presence and drive more traffic to their site. By optimizing your website, you can enhance user experience, increase search engine rankings, and ultimately boost your business's visibility.

### On-Page Techniques (e.g., keywords, meta tags)

1. **Keywords**: Use relevant keywords naturally throughout your content to improve your search engine rankings. Conduct keyword research to identify the most relevant terms for your business.
2. **Meta Tags**: Ensure your meta title and meta description are compelling and include your target keywords. These tags appear in search engine results and can encourage clicks.

### Off-Page Strategies (backlinks, social signals)

1. **Backlinks**: Acquire high-quality backlinks from reputable websites to improve your site's authority and search engine rankings.
2. **Social Signals**: Engage with your audience on social media platforms to increase your brand's visibility and drive traffic to your site.

### Measuring Success

To measure the success of your website optimization efforts, track key metrics such as:
- **Traffic**: Monitor the number of visitors to your site and their geographic location.
- **Conversion Rate**: Analyze the percentage of visitors who take a desired action (e.g., make a purchase, sign up for a newsletter).
- **Engagement**: Track user engagement metrics like time on site, bounce rate, and social shares.

By implementing these strategies, you can enhance your website's performance and achieve your business goals.
</response>

**The Return of the VCT and the Game Changers Tournament: Shaping the Future of Valorant Competitive**

The 2022 Valorant Competitive Scene has been marked by significant changes, particularly with the return of the VCT (Valorant Champions Tour) and the launch of the Game Changers tournament. These updates have not only redefined the competitive landscape but also brought a renewed focus on inclusivity and diversity.

### VCT Structure Updates

The VCT, which was last seen in 2021, has been revamped to ensure a more streamlined and engaging experience for players and fans alike. The tournament structure has been simplified to three tiers: the Qualifiers, the Playoffs, and the Grand Finals. This tiered system allows for a more manageable and exciting journey for teams, from qualifying for the top tier to competing for the ultimate prize.

The Qualifiers are the initial stage where teams compete to earn a spot in the Playoffs. This phase is crucial for teams looking to improve their performance and gain valuable experience. The Playoffs, on the other hand, are the heart of the tournament, featuring intense matches and strategic gameplay. The Grand Finals are the culmination of all the hard work, where the best teams compete for the top prize.

### Game Changers Tournament: A Focus on Inclusivity

The Game Changers tournament is a standout event in the 2022 Valorant Competitive Scene. This tournament is designed to promote inclusivity and diversity by featuring a wide range of teams from different regions and backgrounds. The event aims to break down barriers and provide opportunities for players who might not have had the same access to resources as their more established counterparts.

One of the key aspects of the Game Changers tournament is its focus on inclusivity. The tournament organizers have made a concerted effort to ensure that teams from various regions and backgrounds have an equal chance to compete. This includes providing resources and support to teams that might not have had the same level of exposure or resources as their more established counterparts.

The tournament also features a variety of teams, including those that might not have had the same level of exposure or resources as their more established counterparts. This diversity is not just limited to the teams but also extends to the players themselves. The tournament organizers have made a conscious effort to ensure that the teams and players are diverse and representative of the Valorant community.

### Why Game Changers Matters

The Game Changers tournament is not just a one-off event; it is a reflection of the broader changes happening in the Valorant Competitive Scene. The tournament’s focus on inclusivity and diversity is a step in the right direction, and it is likely to have a lasting impact on the community.

By promoting inclusivity and diversity, the Game Changers tournament is helping to create a more welcoming and inclusive environment for all players. This, in turn, can lead to a more engaged and passionate community, which is essential for the long-term success of the game.

### Conclusion

The return of the VCT and the launch of the Game Changers tournament have brought significant changes to the 2022 Valorant Competitive Scene. The tiered structure of the tournament and the focus on inclusivity and diversity in the Game Changers tournament are just two examples of how the scene is evolving. As the scene continues to grow and change, it is important that we remain committed to promoting inclusivity and diversity, and the Game Changers tournament is a great example of how this can be achieved.

The Return of the Valorant Champions Tour Tournament in 2022

With the recent conclusion of the 2021 Valorant VCT Champions Tournament, competitive players are left asking… what's next for the Valorant Competitive scene in 2022?

I can easily say that the competitive scene in 2021 for Valorant was a massive success. Valorant brought in the masses of audiences across the globe. Even with the disruption of the pandemic, the support and strength backed by several big organizations and influencers are going incredibly strong.

Riot Games has announced the road map for the Valorant Champions Tour for the 2022 year, but there are several exciting changes to look forward to in 2022.

2022 Valorant Champions Tour roadmap — addition of Game Changers circuit

2022 VCT will keep the same three-tier system: Challengers, Masters, and Champions. Each Challenger stage will still have open-qualifiers. The game is still relatively new, so this is key to allowing new and fresh talent to emerge into the competitive scene. The new addition is Valorant Game Changes, which will be the first-ever international LAN tournament for female and non-binary professional gamers. In the competitive Valorant scene, we have seen several large e-sport organizations, such as C9 and TSM FTX, who have signed several all-female rosters. I believe that this is a huge milestone for the e-sport competitive scene as it creates a safe space that is driven by inclusivity.

Sure! Here’s a concise and detailed article about the Zone Diet for weight loss, focusing on how it works and its differences from other diets:

### The Zone Diet: A Balanced Approach to Weight Loss

The Zone Diet, developed by Dr. Barry Sears, is a popular weight loss plan that emphasizes a balanced macronutrient ratio to help control hunger and promote weight loss. Unlike many other diets that focus on strict calorie counting or restrictive macronutrient ratios, the Zone Diet is designed to be more sustainable and effective in the long run.

#### Key Principles of the Zone Diet

The Zone Diet is based on the idea of maintaining a balance between carbohydrates, proteins, and fats. Dr. Sears' research has shown that a balanced ratio of these macronutrients can help regulate insulin levels and reduce inflammation, which are key factors in weight management.

##### Macronutrient Balance

The Zone Diet recommends a macronutrient ratio of 40% carbohydrates, 30% protein, and 30% fat. This balance is crucial for maintaining energy levels and preventing hunger. Here’s how it works:

- **Carbohydrates**: Focus on complex carbohydrates like whole grains, vegetables, and fruits. These provide sustained energy and fiber, which helps keep you full.
- **Proteins**: Include lean proteins such as chicken, turkey, fish, and legumes. These help build and repair tissues and provide essential amino acids.
- **Fats**: Incorporate healthy fats like olive oil, nuts, and avocados. These are important for brain function and overall health.

##### The 5-6 Meals a Day

One of the unique aspects of the Zone Diet is the emphasis on eating 5-6 small meals throughout the day. This approach helps keep your metabolism active and prevents overeating. Here’s how it works:

- **Breakfast**: Start your day with a balanced meal that includes a protein source, a complex carbohydrate, and a healthy fat. For example, scrambled eggs with whole-grain toast and avocado.
- **Lunch**: Have a similar balanced meal, perhaps a salad with grilled chicken and a side of quinoa.
- **Snacks**: Throughout the day, have small snacks like a handful of nuts, a piece of fruit, or a small serving of yogurt.
- **Dinner**: Enjoy a meal that includes a protein source, a complex carbohydrate, and a healthy fat. For example, a salmon fillet with quinoa and a side of steamed vegetables.
- **Evening Snack**: If you’re still hungry, have a small snack like a small bowl of berries or a handful of almonds.

#### Why the Zone Diet is Popular

The Zone Diet has gained popularity for several reasons:

- **Sustainability**: Unlike diets that require strict calorie counting or severe restrictions, the Zone Diet is more sustainable and easier to maintain long-term.
- **Health Benefits**: The balanced macronutrient ratio helps regulate insulin levels and reduce inflammation, which can lead to better overall health.
- **Weight Loss**: Studies have shown that the Zone Diet can be effective for weight loss, especially when combined with regular exercise.

#### How the Zone Diet Differs from Other Diets

While the Zone Diet is similar to other low-carb diets in that it emphasizes a balanced macronutrient ratio, it differs in several key ways:

- **Macronutrient Ratio**: The Zone Diet focuses on a specific ratio of 40% carbohydrates, 30% protein, and 30% fat, which is different from other diets that might have stricter ratios.
- **Meal Frequency**: The Zone Diet encourages eating 5-6 small meals a day, which is different from the typical 3-meal diet.
- **Inflammation Reduction**: The Zone Diet emphasizes reducing inflammation, which is a key factor in weight management and overall health.

In summary, the Zone Diet is a balanced approach to weight loss that focuses on a specific macronutrient ratio and meal frequency. By maintaining a balanced diet and eating regularly, you can achieve your weight loss goals while promoting overall health.

If you have any specific questions or need further details, feel free to ask!
</response>

Sure! Here’s a concise article on digital marketing for small business owners and entrepreneurs:

**Digital Marketing for Small Business Owners and Entrepreneurs**

Digital marketing is a set of strategies used to promote products, services, or brands through digital channels. It’s crucial for small businesses because it helps them compete on a level playing field with larger corporations. Here are three key strategies: SEO, social media, and email marketing.

**Search Engine Optimization (SEO)**

SEO involves optimizing your website to rank higher in search engine results pages (SERPs). This helps attract more organic traffic to your site. To implement SEO, focus on keyword research, creating quality content, building backlinks, and improving site speed and mobile-friendliness.

**Social Media Marketing**

Social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn offer powerful tools for engaging with customers and promoting your brand. Use these platforms to share content, interact with followers, and run targeted ads. Consistency is key, so post regularly and engage with your audience.

**Email Marketing**

Email marketing allows you to communicate directly with your customers and nurture leads. Use email to send newsletters, promotional offers, and personalized messages. Segment your email list to target different groups and use automation to streamline your campaigns.

**Benefits for Small Businesses**

Digital marketing helps small businesses reach a broader audience and build brand awareness. It’s cost-effective compared to traditional marketing methods and allows you to target specific demographics. By leveraging digital channels, small businesses can compete with larger corporations and gain a competitive edge.

In summary, digital marketing is essential for small business owners and entrepreneurs. By focusing on SEO, social media, and email marketing, you can effectively promote your brand and reach a wider audience. This approach helps level the playing field and provides valuable resources that were previously exclusive to larger companies.
</response>

**Attestation Services in Dubai: Why They’re Important and How They Work**

Attestation services in Dubai are crucial for businesses and individuals looking to ensure the accuracy and reliability of their documents. These services are particularly important for expats and businesses that frequently deal with government agencies and international transactions.

**Why Attestation Services Are Important**

Attestation services help verify the authenticity of documents, ensuring they meet the required standards and are legally valid. This is especially important for documents that need to be presented to government authorities or international partners. Without proper attestation, documents may be rejected or require additional verification, leading to delays and potential legal issues.

**How the Process Works**

The process of obtaining attestation services in Dubai typically involves the following steps:

1. **Document Preparation**: Ensure all documents are complete and accurate.
2. **Submission**: Submit the documents to the relevant government agency or attestation service provider.
3. **Verification**: The agency or provider verifies the documents and signs them to confirm their authenticity.
4. **Delivery**: Receive the attested documents, which are now legally valid and can be used for official purposes.

**Genius Attestation Services**

Genius Attestation Services is a reputable provider of attestation services in Dubai. They are known for their quick turnaround times and affordable prices, making them a popular choice for businesses and individuals.

- **Quick Turnaround**: Genius Attestation Services offers fast service, ensuring your documents are ready in a timely manner.
- **Affordable Pricing**: They provide competitive rates, making attestation services accessible to a wide range of clients.
- **Professional Team**: Their team of experienced professionals ensures that your documents are handled with the highest level of care and accuracy.

In today’s world, identity theft is a major problem. If you have your identity stolen, it can take years to get it back. In order to avoid this, many people have started getting attestation services in Dubai.

These services are a type of authentication process in which the higher authorities validates a person’s identity. It can be used for a variety of things, including getting a driver’s license, opening a bank account, or for anything else where you need to prove your identity.

The attestation process starts with a person going to the embassy of the country they want to attest their identity. The embassy will then make a copy of the person’s passport and other documents.

Need of Attestation services in Dubai

Attestation services in Dubai are needed for a variety of purposes, such as obtaining a new passport, getting a residence visa, getting a new driver’s license, or opening a bank account.

They are also used for a variety of purposes, such as notarizing a document, witnessing a signature, authenticating a document, and more.

It is important to attest the authenticity of any document. This includes certificates, diplomas, transcripts, degrees, passports, visas, marriage certificates, birth certificates, wills, deeds, powers of attorney, or any other documents.

Why Genius Attestation Services?

There are many reasons to have documents attested. For example, you may need to have a birth certificate certified so that you can get a passport. You may need to have a diploma certified so that you can get a job.

You may need to have a will certified so that you can get a death certificate. There are many reasons to have documents attested.

At Genius Attestation Services, we can attest your documents quickly and easily. Attestation services in Dubai are a cost-effective and secure way to verify a person’s qualifications. The process is quick and affordable, and the attestation services in Dubai are trustworthy.

Natural cures for diabetes must take into consideration your unique cause. Then it must target your personal symptoms, which will have endless permutations of the major and common symptoms. Diet.

Or, to put it another way, if you put diesel in your unleaded vehicle, would you expect it to run at all, let alone well?

So diet is essential to your good health and if you have diabetes, this is an area that you must address first, to get any results.

Homeopathic treatment is a safe, powerful yet gentle modality of complete and natural health care. Homeopathy is a way of life, rather than a ‘quick fix’ type of health care. By supporting your homeopathic treatment with a natural diet, regular exercise, optimum sleep, natural exposure to the sun on bare skin, time for you, time to relax, you can expect to have the best of health.

Do try it once.

1. **Cybersecurity Risks**: Increased vulnerability to hacking and data breaches.
2. **Customer Trust**: Building trust with customers can be challenging.
3. **Technical Issues**: Dependence on technology can lead to downtime and service disruptions.

### Actionable Tips
1. **Time-Blocking for Work-Life Balance**: Allocate specific times for work and personal activities to maintain a healthy balance.
2. **Budget-Friendly Tools**: Use free or low-cost tools like Google Workspace for email and document management, and consider using free hosting services for your website.

Feel free to adjust these tips to better fit your specific needs!
</response>
gts:
Marketing illustrations by Storyset

Working from home has numerous advantages, but also comes with its disadvantages.

Building a successful online business is a dream come true for many people around the world, though to some, it is not always fun and games.

Sources have it that you can survive on online businesses and enjoy the freedom of earning real money from your passions.

As earlier mentioned, running an online business is not always a walk in the park, and therefore it is wise not to underestimate the hard work that a successful online business requires.

To understand what it entails to run an online business, let us take a look at the Benefits and Costs of running online businesses.

Benefits of Running an Online Business

1) Flexible schedule and rules.

Owning an online job allows you to create your rules and be your boss. With the flexibility that comes with self-employment, one can even create time to see friends and family.

2) Low startup costs.

One key benefit of owning an online business is the low starting cost. Sources have it that you can start a website with less than $100, and as your business grows, you can invest more in it. An online business gives you the liberty of working from your house and requires no leasing costs. You do not have to worry about an employee’s salary too!

3) You become the boss.

Running your own online business gives you the mandate of setting the rules and regulations. Nobody tells you what to do, and you get an opportunity of controlling your destiny. You get to make decisions about marketing, product or service development, customer service, and pretty much everything related to your business.

Cost of Running an Online Business

1) Long working hours

For any business to succeed, it calls for hard work and long working hours. Starting an online job from scratch takes a good amount of time to be successful and in some cases, people are required to work on weekends to reach their targets.

2) Requires a lot of discipline.

With all the freedom that comes with running your own business, discipline is fundamental. The time one takes for breaks should be limited, and more focus should be made to reach the set target.

Basic Needs Come First

But the tricky part lies when you are not paying the credit amount in time. Then the whole amount that’s billed over the furnishings would be charged with an interest.

Plan Perfectly

Keep a close watch on all the spaces at the home you purchase or want to walk-in. Never let a misplacement or shortage of furnishings break the beauty of your home. Plan accordingly and especially in a way that the products including beds, and sofa chairs fit right into the spaces.

This means that if you are planning to deposit funds with them, which you can do rightfully and safely.

SPREADS

Both the brokers accept multiple deposit and withdrawal methods with multiple credit cards, multiple electronic payment methods, bank wire transfer, local bank transfer, and other payment methods. There are no extra fees charged for withdrawal of funds with both too.

**Why Improving Public Speaking Skills is Important**

Public speaking is a crucial skill that can significantly impact your career and personal life. Here are some key reasons why enhancing your public speaking abilities is beneficial:

1. **Enhances Communication Skills**: Effective public speaking helps you convey your ideas clearly and persuasively, which is essential in both professional and personal settings.

2. **Boosts Confidence**: Overcoming the fear of public speaking can boost your overall confidence, making you more assertive in various situations.

3. **Improves Leadership Potential**: Strong public speaking skills are highly valued in leadership roles, as they enable you to inspire and motivate others.

4. **Enhances Networking**: Being able to speak confidently in front of groups can open doors to new opportunities and help you build stronger professional relationships.

5. **Increases Persuasiveness**: The ability to articulate your thoughts effectively can make you a more persuasive advocate for your ideas and opinions.

6. **Improves Career Opportunities**: Many employers value candidates with strong public speaking skills, as they are seen as effective communicators and team leaders.

To further develop your public speaking skills, consider joining a Toastmasters club, taking a public speaking course, or practicing in front of a mirror. Consistent practice will help you become more comfortable and confident in your abilities.

Feel free to reach out if you need more tips or have any questions!

Sure! Here’s a simple SWOT analysis for your article:

**Strengths:**
- **Clarity and Relatability:** By using everyday examples, you can make your points more accessible and engaging for your readers.
- **Engagement:** A conversational tone can help keep your audience interested and encourage them to continue reading.

**Weaknesses:**
- **Overly Simplistic:** Be careful not to oversimplify complex concepts, which could mislead your readers.
- **Lack of Depth:** While everyday examples are great, you might need to delve deeper into some topics to provide a comprehensive overview.

**Opportunities:**
- **Interactivity:** Encourage your readers to share their own experiences and insights in the comments section.
- **Networking:** Connect with other experts in your field to gain new perspectives and ideas.

**Threats:**
- **Misinterpretation:** Be mindful of how your examples might be interpreted by different audiences.
- **Overreliance:** Relying too much on examples could make your article feel less structured and more disjointed.

Feel free to use these points as a starting point and adjust them based on your specific content and audience. Let me know if you need more examples or if you want to add any other sections!
</response>
gts:
I’m feeling a little lost. (that’s a way of starting a post han?!)

I don’t know exactly what I want, what I like, what I want to do or accomplish.

I always knew what I wanted. Since my 11th grade in High School I knew what college degree to choose. Since then I knew what I liked and what I wanted to do. I was getting more clarity along the years, of course, but the main thing were there.

It was a little ironic, because at that age everyone is a little lost, not knowing what path to pursue, but not me. I always knew.

Right now, at a age where I was supposed to have things a little more figured out, I don’t… Maybe it’s just destiny doing its things, ou some form of compensation, or just some fase.

We don’t need to have it all figured out. We don’t need to plan our lives like a Marketing Plan. We just have to live it. Just like Lilly Aldrin would say to Ted: “You can design your life like a building, you just have to live it”.

How can we just live our lives, without designing it or planning it? Well, I don’t know, but we I find out, I’ll tell you ;)

We hope you’re ready for an intense week of Spider Tanks esports tournament action! The teams formed in the last couple weeks and they’ve been practicing hard in preparation for this week-long tournament event.

Additional prizes on the line for the event are still TBA, but suffice it to say that competition will be fierce in this first esports event for the upcoming brawler by GAMEDIA!

This Week’s Schedule

Here is the bracket laid out for this week’s matchups, which are scheduled in such a way that spectators can enjoy every one of them if they so choose. Tonight is the first night of the tournament, so there will be 3 matchups beginning at 7pm PST.

Tonight’s Matchups

7:00pm PST — ShootyBooms Revenants vs. Second String Spiders

8:oopm PST — Pandas Gone Wild vs. The Lone Tankers

9:00 pm PST —Aracnokillers vs. Immediate George

To catch the action live, join the Discord Community, where matchups will be shared live in the Spider Tanks Voice channel all week long!

About Spider Tanks

Spider Tanks is an upcoming PVP arena brawler from GAMEDIA and Gala Games. This expertly crafted and brilliantly competitive game will be the world’s first internationally renowned play-to-earn esport! Learn more at Spidertanks.game.

About GAMEDIA

GAMEDIA is an award winning game studio from the Netherlands, with an extensive track record and history. The long list of games they have developed are mostly based on well know entertainment IP’s and have seen the light on a wide range of platforms and hardware. Currently they are focused on creating our own high quality multiplayer games for PC, consoles as well as mobile.

Sure! Here’s a concise guide on how to use Figma’s Auto Layout for creating a resume, focusing on vertical/horizontal arrangement, spacing settings, and A4 paper setup. For the A4 frame, you should set the width to 2480px and the height to 3508px to ensure it fits the standard A4 paper size (210mm x 297mm).

### A4 Paper Setup
1. Open your Figma project and go to the “Layout” tab.
2. Click on the “Auto Layout” button.
3. Set the width to 2480px and the height to 3508px.

### Vertical/Horizontal Arrangement
- **Vertical Arrangement**: Use the “Stack” layout to arrange elements vertically. This is useful for sections like “Work Experience” or “Education.”
- **Horizontal Arrangement**: Use the “Grid” layout to arrange elements horizontally. This is ideal for sections like “Skills” or “Projects.”

### Spacing Settings
- **Padding**: Use padding to add space between elements. For example, set padding to 10px on all sides.
- **Margin**: Use margin to add space around the entire layout. Set a margin of 20px on all sides.

### Alignment Options
- **Packed Alignment**: This aligns elements tightly together, which is good for sections like “Skills” where you want all bullet points to be equally spaced.
- **Space Between Alignment**: This adds space between elements, which is better for sections like “Projects” where you might want to separate each project description.

### Example: Packed vs Space Between
- **Packed Alignment Example**:
  - **Skills Section**:
    - **HTML/CSS**
    - **JavaScript**
    - **React**
    - **Node.js**
  - **Space Between Alignment Example**:
    - **HTML/CSS**:
      - HTML
      - CSS
    - **JavaScript**:

    - **React**:

    - **Node.js**:
      - Node.js

Feel free to adjust the settings and examples to fit your specific needs!

---

**Simplifying Drag and Drop Functionality in Android Apps**

Drag and drop functionality is a powerful tool for enhancing user experience in Android apps. However, integrating this feature can be complex, especially when dealing with the latest libraries and frameworks. In this article, we will explore how to simplify the process of implementing drag and drop functionality in Android apps, with a focus on using the **DragAndDrop** library, which is currently in **alpha**.

The **DragAndDrop** library simplifies the implementation of drag and drop functionality by providing a straightforward API that abstracts away many of the complexities involved. This makes it easier for developers to focus on the core functionality of their app rather than the underlying mechanics of drag and drop.

However, it's important to note that the **DragAndDrop** library is in **alpha** and is still under development. This means that while it offers a lot of benefits, there may be some limitations and bugs that need to be addressed. To help improve the library, we encourage developers to try it out and provide feedback. Your input will be invaluable in helping us refine and stabilize the library.

To get started with drag and drop in your Android app, follow these steps:

1. **Add the Library to Your Project**: First, add the **DragAndDrop** library to your project. You can do this by adding the following dependency to your `build.gradle` file:
   ```gradle
   implementation 'com.example:draganddrop:1.0.0'
   ```

2. **Set Up the Drag and Drop Context**: Next, set up the drag and drop context in your app. This involves creating a `DragAndDropContext` object and configuring it with the necessary parameters. Here’s an example:
   ```java
   DragAndDropContext context = new DragAndDropContext.Builder()
       .setSourceView(R.id.source_view)
       .setTargetView(R.id.target_view)
       .setOnDragListener(new DragAndDrop.OnDragListener() {
           @Override
           public boolean onDrag(DragAndDropEvent event) {
               // Handle drag events here
               return true;
           }
       })
       .build();
   ```

3. **Handle Drag and Drop Events**: Finally, handle the drag and drop events by implementing the `OnDragListener` interface. This allows you to respond to drag events and perform any necessary actions. Here’s an example:
   ```java
   @Override
   public boolean onDrag(DragAndDropEvent event) {
       if (event.getAction() == DragAndDropEvent.ACTION_DRAG_STARTED) {
           // Start drag
       } else if (event.getAction() == DragAndDropEvent.ACTION_DRAG_ENTERED) {
           // Enter target
       } else if (event.getAction() == DragAndDropEvent.ACTION_DRAG_EXITED) {
           // Exit target
       } else if (event.getAction() == DragAndDropEvent.ACTION_DROP) {
           // Drop occurred
           View targetView = event.getDragView();
           // Perform any necessary actions with the dropped view
       }
       return true;
   }
   ```

By following these steps, you can easily integrate drag and drop functionality into your Android app using the **DragAndDrop** library. Remember to provide feedback to help improve the library and make it even better for future developers.

---

gts:
At the most basic level, drag and drop is a gesture where a user can tap and hold an image, text string or other data element, then drag it into another app (or to another location in the same app) and release, where the data is incorporated in the new location. This gesture is usually a long press on touch screens or a click and drag when using a mouse.

A simple drag & drop sample.

While Android has long supported drag and drop ( DragEvent was introduced in Android 3.0, API level 11), integrating full support for handling gestures, events, permissions and callbacks has proven to be complex.

Today we’re introducing the Jetpack DragAndDrop library as an alpha release to make it easier for you to handle data dropped into your app.

Drag and drop is becoming increasingly relevant for large screen form factors: tablet and laptops, but especially also foldables, where split screen is used 7 times as often than on conventional phones. The ability to drag data from one app to another is a natural experience for users as they multitask more efficiently with their apps in split-screen or windowed modes.

While dragging text from EditTexts is supported natively by the platform, we strongly recommend enabling users to drag any images, files or text from other components of your app. Just as importantly, we encourage allowing users to drop data into your apps as well.

Dragging from one app into another.

DropHelper , in combination with DragStartHelper , makes it much easier to take care of gesture support, callbacks, styling and pixel-perfect alignment.

DragStartHelper

DragStartHelper is a utility class in Jetpack core that detects gestures commonly used to start a drag, such as long pressing or click and dragging with a mouse.

DropHelper

The new DropHelper is a utility class that takes care of listeners and drop targets. Be sure to use addInnerEditTexts() when building DropHelper.Options to ensure that any nested EditTexts inside your drop target don’t acquire focus instead.

Learn more

Read more in the Drag and drop guide on Android Developers, dive into the large screen sample to see DropHelper in practice and then try it out in alpha now to give us feedback.

Thanks to Florina, Ben and Nick!

The Dolphins and Packers are expected to dominate the defensive side of the ball, with their strong pass-rushing abilities and stout run defenses. The Cowboys and Chargers, on the other hand, will need to rely on their special teams to make plays.

**LB: TJ Watt, Foye Oluokun, Devin White, Alex Singleton**

TJ Watt is a force to be reckoned with, with his speed and athleticism making him a nightmare for opposing quarterbacks. Foye Oluokun and Devin White are solid linebackers, providing support and coverage. Alex Singleton is a versatile player, capable of playing multiple positions.

**DB: Jeremy Chinn, Harrison Smith, Minkah Fitzpatrick, Logan Ryan**

### **WEEK 16 PINES**

Sure! Here’s a concise article on DIY bond cleaning tips for tenants:

**DIY Bond Cleaning Tips for Tenants**

Bond cleaning is a crucial task for tenants, especially when moving out. While professional services can be costly, there are many cost-saving DIY methods you can use. Here are some effective and affordable tips:

1. **Vinegar and Baking Soda**:
   - Mix equal parts white vinegar and baking soda to create a paste.
   - Apply the paste to the bond lines and let it sit for about 15 minutes.
   - Scrub the area gently with a soft brush and rinse with water.
   - This natural solution is effective and environmentally friendly.

2. **Baking Soda and Water**:
   - Create a paste using baking soda and water.
   - Apply the paste to the bond lines and let it sit for 10-15 minutes.
   - Scrub the area with a soft brush and rinse with water.
   - Baking soda is a great abrasive that can help remove stubborn stains.

3. **Hydrogen Peroxide**:
   - Mix hydrogen peroxide with water in a 1:1 ratio.
   - Apply the mixture to the bond lines and let it sit for 10-15 minutes.
   - Scrub the area gently with a soft brush and rinse with water.
   - Hydrogen peroxide is effective at breaking down stains and can be used as a natural alternative to harsh chemicals.

4. **White Distilled Vinegar**:
   - Apply white vinegar directly to the bond lines.
   - Let it sit for 10-15 minutes.
   - Scrub the area with a soft brush and rinse with water.
   - Vinegar is a natural cleaner that can help remove stains and odors.

5. **Microfiber Cloths**:
   - Use microfiber cloths to gently wipe down the bond lines.
   - These cloths are gentle on surfaces and can help remove dirt and grime.
   - Make sure to rinse the cloths with water after use.

6. **Rubbing Alcohol**:
   - Mix rubbing alcohol with water in a 1:1 ratio.
   - Apply the mixture to the bond lines and let it sit for 10-15 minutes.
   - Scrub the area with a soft brush and rinse with water.
   - Rubbing alcohol can help remove tough stains and odors.

7. **Salt and Water**:
   - Mix salt and water to create a paste.
   - Apply the paste to the bond lines and let it sit for 10-15 minutes.
   - Scrub the area with a soft brush and rinse with water.
   - Salt is a natural abrasive that can help remove stubborn stains.

8. **Bleach Alternative**:
   - Mix baking soda and water to create a paste.
   - Apply the paste to the bond lines and let it sit for 10-15 minutes.
   - Scrub the area with a soft brush and rinse with water.
   - This mixture can help remove stains and odors without the harshness of traditional bleach.

By using these household items, you can effectively clean bond lines without breaking the bank. Remember to test any new cleaning methods on a small, inconspicuous area first to ensure it doesn’t damage the surface.

For more detailed information or specific questions, feel free to reach out. Stay organized and efficient!
</response>

**Accountability through Real-Time Data**

Nonprofit organizations often struggle with maintaining accountability and transparency, especially when it comes to financial reporting. Traditional methods of financial reporting can be time-consuming and may not provide real-time insights into an organization's financial health. However, nonprofit accounting software can significantly enhance accountability by providing real-time data and analytics.

One of the key benefits of using nonprofit accounting software is the ability to monitor financial performance in real-time. This allows organizations to quickly identify any discrepancies or potential issues, ensuring that they can take corrective action before they become major problems. For example, if a nonprofit organization notices a sudden increase in expenses, they can investigate the cause and take steps to address it promptly.

Moreover, real-time data can help nonprofits comply with GAAP (Generally Accepted Accounting Principles) and FASB (Financial Accounting Standards Board) standards. By having access to up-to-date financial information, nonprofits can ensure that their financial statements are accurate and consistent with industry standards. This not only enhances their credibility but also helps them to attract funding and support from donors and investors.

To illustrate, let's consider a scenario where a nonprofit organization uses nonprofit accounting software to track its expenses. The software can provide real-time data on spending, allowing the organization to monitor trends and make informed decisions. For instance, if the organization notices a spike in spending on a particular program, it can investigate the reason and adjust its budget accordingly. This proactive approach helps the organization to stay on track and maintain its financial health.

In conclusion, nonprofit accounting software plays a crucial role in enhancing accountability by providing real-time data and analytics. By leveraging this technology, nonprofits can ensure that their financial reporting is accurate, transparent, and compliant with GAAP and FASB standards. This not only builds trust with stakeholders but also helps organizations to achieve their mission more effectively.

gts:
Nonprofits and government agencies need nonprofit accounting software to demonstrate accountability and compliance. Let’s take a deep dive into what you need to know in choosing the most compliant software.

A compliant nonprofit accounting software system tracks revenue to a designated purpose and prevents misuse of donations.

If a nonprofit wants to be compliant with GAAP and FASB 116/117, all of their funds must be grouped into two categories of net assets: (1) without donor restrictions and (2) net assets with donor restrictions, which replace the three former categories of unrestricted, temporarily restricted and permanently restricted net assets. To be GAAP-compliant, nonprofits only need two funds to report on the breakdown of net assets on IRS form 990.

Nonprofit Accounting Software Identifies Who, What and Why

In order to fully understand why nonprofits need nonprofit accounting, you need to understand three fundamental questions:

Who is the source of revenue? What is the designated purpose? Why nonprofits need to classify revenue?

1. Who is the source of revenue?

Who identifies the source of revenue and provider of services and expenses. This is know as donor designated revenue. Who is donating or granting funds to the nonprofit? Who is the nonprofit paying expenses, such as salaries, payroll taxes, services, rent, utilities?

Sure! Here’s a draft for a short article on blockchain and cryptocurrencies in India, focusing on land record management and welfare distribution:

**Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies in India: Breaking Down Myths and Enhancing Transparency**

Blockchain technology has the potential to revolutionize various sectors in India, including land record management and welfare distribution. One of the common misconceptions is that blockchain is only used for criminal activities. However, this is far from the truth. By leveraging blockchain, we can significantly enhance transparency and reduce corruption in these critical areas.

**Land Record Management**

Land records are often a source of corruption and inefficiency. Land records are prone to manipulation, leading to disputes and delays. Blockchain technology can provide a tamper-proof and transparent system for managing land records. Each transaction involving land records can be recorded on a blockchain, ensuring that every change is immutable and verifiable. This not only prevents fraud but also ensures that all stakeholders have access to accurate and up-to-date information.

**Welfare Distribution**

Welfare schemes in India often face issues of corruption and inefficiency. Funds meant for welfare programs are frequently misused or diverted, leading to a lack of transparency and accountability. Blockchain can help address these issues by providing a secure and transparent platform for distributing welfare funds. Each transaction can be recorded on a blockchain, ensuring that every recipient receives the correct amount and that the funds are used as intended. This can help reduce corruption and ensure that welfare programs reach the intended beneficiaries.

**Reducing Corruption**

Blockchain technology can also help reduce corruption in government schemes. By providing a transparent and immutable record of transactions, blockchain can help prevent fraud and ensure that funds are used for their intended purpose. This can help build trust in government programs and ensure that resources are allocated effectively.

In conclusion, blockchain technology has the potential to transform land record management and welfare distribution in India. By providing a secure and transparent platform, blockchain can help reduce corruption and ensure that resources are used effectively. Policymakers should consider implementing blockchain solutions to enhance transparency and efficiency in these critical areas.
</response>
gts:
But but blockchain is for criminals…

Too many times have we heard this argument. It is almost a meme by now. It is a bit true, but also a lot wrong. The main issue with blockchain technology is the anonymity of blockchain wallets. Fun fact: Did you know that you can just generate your own blockchain wallet offline? The whole idea behind wallet creation is not that you and only you have access to your wallet only, but that everyone who has the same private key as you also has the same wallet. The “security” only stems from one aspect: Stochastics! Two people have a very very low chance to create the same wallet. For example, MetaMask creates them using 2048 seed words. In total, you need 12 of them to create a wallet. Therefore, there are 204⁸¹² possibilities. Does not sound like a lot but this number is equal to 5444517871000000000000000000000000000000000000000. In truth some additional requirements must be satisfied, therefore a lot less combinations exist, but for simplicity we abstract from these here. All of these wallets are therefore entirely anonymous. The only way to know who has access to which address is by creating a mapping between a person’s real identity and the wallet address they have used for a transaction. Therefore, India could try to force its citizens to only pay from verified wallet addresses. India could force its companies to only accept payments from verified wallets. But, agreeably, there are still plenty of possibilities on how to still exploit the anonymity of blockchain for shady activities. There’s one crucial aspect to the blockchain though: It keeps a log of every transaction ever executed forever, redundantly backed up on thousands or even millions of servers worldwide. Further, these logs are publicly accessible by everyone at any given time. Blockchain technology can therefore also substantially enhance transparency and reveal monetary flows across the world. It acts as an ultimate threat: Yes, you can engage in illegal transactions, but should your wallet address ever become traceable back to you, even if only by accident, everyone can see what you’ve done. Therefore, India should not ban “private” (i.e.. “decentralized”) blockchains, but rather embrace them and build systems around them to enhance both their transparency and security.

Cosigning a loan is akin to betting on a losing horse. Just as a bettor who consistently chooses losing horses faces financial ruin, a cosigner who repeatedly backs individuals with a proven track record of financial failure is at risk of significant financial loss.

When you cosign a loan, you become legally responsible for the debt if the primary borrower defaults. This means you could face wage garnishment, bank account seizures, and other legal actions to recover the money owed. The financial implications are severe, as you are not only responsible for the loan amount but also for any additional fees and interest that accrue.

In essence, cosigning a loan is a high-stakes bet. If the primary borrower struggles financially, you could end up losing a substantial portion of your savings or even your entire financial security. Therefore, it is crucial to thoroughly vet the primary borrower before agreeing to cosign a loan. This includes checking their credit history, financial stability, and ability to manage debt responsibly.
</response>
gts:
Personal Finance

Don’t Cosign A Loan, Don’t Bet On A Losing Horse

Photo by DDP on Unsplash

Worried about cosigning a loan for someone in need? To help you make the decision easier, remember that people who require cosigners often miss payments and have poor credit. They have a history that depicts poor financial decision-making.

The reason people need a cosign is because they can’t do it alone without your help; they need you. The question is, are you willing to take a chance on the Detroit Lions, whose record is 2 wins-12 losses-1 tie. I wouldn’t.

Yes, we take risks when we make investments, but consigning a loan is not the same thing — it’s entirely different. You’re investing in someone who has already shown you a record of failing financials. In the startup world, this is a major red flag.

Choosing not to help your best friend or sibling get a new car, take out a personal loan, or get a credit card is disheartening — especially if you have the means to help.

What happens if they start missing payments? What happens if they decide they can’t make any payments and you’re stuck with the payments? Will you be okay with that?

The MRT station is Somerset, making it easily accessible to both locals and tourists. **The Vibe at Workcentral**

The open floor plan encourages collaboration and creativity, making it the ideal setting for brainstorming sessions and team meetings.

**Pantry with a View**

**24/7 Access**

Sure, here's a draft of the article:

**Atrangi Re: Praise for Dhanush's Acting and AR Rahman's Music, but Critiques of Stereotypes and Mental Health**

**Praise for Dhanush's Acting and AR Rahman's Music**

Atrangi Re is a visually stunning film that showcases the talents of Dhanush and AR Rahman. Dhanush delivers a nuanced and powerful performance, bringing depth to his character. His chemistry with the lead actress is palpable, and his emotional range is commendable. AR Rahman's score is a highlight, with memorable melodies that enhance the film's emotional moments.

**Critiques of Tamil Stereotypes and Cultural Clichés**

However, the film also falls short in its portrayal of Tamil culture. The cringe-worthy Tamilnadu sequence is over-the-top, with exaggerated accents and cultural clichés. The film fails to capture the nuanced aspects of Tamil traditions, which is disappointing. The use of stereotypes can be seen in the portrayal of certain characters, which may alienate viewers who are familiar with the region.

**Critique of Mental Health Subplot**

The mental health subplot is another area where the film falls short. The character's struggle with mental health is oversimplified and poorly resolved. Given that Dhanush's character is a doctor, the film could have delved deeper into the complexities of mental health care and the challenges faced by professionals in this field. The resolution of the subplot is unsatisfactory, leaving the audience unsatisfied.

In summary, Atrangi Re is a visually impressive film with strong performances, but it struggles with stereotypical portrayals of Tamil culture and an oversimplified mental health subplot. The film could benefit from a more nuanced exploration of these themes.
</response>
gts:
I hate Dhanush’s forced humility off screen for obvious reasons but Dhanush on screen is a powerhouse performer. "Atrangi Re" is another testimony to his outstanding acting ability. He makes you laugh when he laughs, he makes you cry when he cries. He is such a terrific actor.

As revealed in the trailer, the movie is about a forced marriage and the aftermath the couple face because of the same. The movie has an interesting plot that can make anyone say "wow" but the screenplay lacks big-time. The movie as a whole was a middling affair that solely relies on performance of the actors.

Sara Ali Khan played her character to perfect while Akshay Kumar was just decent. ARR is the hero behind the screens for the movie. His songs and soulful BGM is what promotes the movie from being average to decent/good. Particularly loved the "Little Little" sequence in the movie. Imo, the best 10 minutes in the movie.

The movie has equal shortcomings to that of the positives. The lack of engaging screenplay, irking logical loopholes, stereotyping tamils(though it's not new in a Bollywood movie, the entire Tamilnadu sequence was a turn off) and inadequate character background are some of the shortcomings of the movie. It's as if the director who wrote terrific first half didn't know how to end the movie in second half.

~Overall, a decent movie that falls short in the latter half. Watch it for Dhanush and AR Rahman.

P.S. : There is some serious ill handled mental issue concept that is sure to stir up arguments in the coming days. Dhanush being a doctor in the movie, it was baffling the way it was treated in the movie.

Sure! Here’s a draft for eMarketer:

**How Middle-Market Brands Can Use Alternative DSPs to Overcome Programmatic Minimums**

With a total programmatic spend of $133 billion and a 91% media mix share, DSP platforms like MediaMath and Trade Desk set strict minimums, which can be a significant barrier for middle-market brands. However, alternative DSPs offer a solution by providing lower or no minimums, allowing these brands to bypass the limitations.

**Alternative DSP Options:**

1. **BrightRoll**: Offers flexible pricing models that can accommodate smaller budgets, making it an attractive option for middle-market brands.

2. **Rubicon Project**: Provides a range of pricing options, including a "pay-per-impression" model, which can be more cost-effective for smaller budgets.

3. **Xaxis**: Known for its transparency and flexibility, Xaxis allows brands to set their own budgets and can be a good fit for middle-market advertisers looking to avoid minimum spend requirements.

**Benefits for Middle-Market Brands:**

- **Flexibility**: Alternative DSPs offer more flexible pricing models, allowing middle-market brands to manage their budgets more effectively.
- **Cost Efficiency**: Lower minimums can lead to more cost-efficient campaigns, as brands can allocate their budgets more precisely.
- **Increased Reach**: With more options available, middle-market brands can expand their reach and target a broader audience without being constrained by strict minimums.

By leveraging alternative DSPs, middle-market brands can overcome the limitations imposed by traditional DSP platforms and achieve better programmatic advertising outcomes.
</response>
gts:
DSP Technology for Middle-market Brands

DSP Technology for Middle-market Brands

Brittany Wray shares insights on programmatic advertising and its influence on marketing. She highlights the outcomes derived from the said technique creating a win-win situation for all. If you look at most leading indicators for programmatic digital advertising, the trends point steadily upwards with DSP Technology for Middle-market Brands. The latest forecast from eMarketer projects that marketers will spend more dollars on programmatic ($133B), that it will account for a greater share of the media mix (91%), and that a growing and increasingly premium share of available inventory will be transacted programmatically.

It’s Only Middlemen for The Middle Market — Major brands and agencies have long mastered the ins and outs of programmatic tech. Reading the industry trades, one could easily assume that the vast majority of advertisers have followed suit. The simple reason is that they don’t spend enough money on their own to meet the minimums for leading DSPs like MediaMath and The Trade Desk. These arbitrary minimums have excluded the majority of advertisers from the programmatic advertising technology.

It’s a lost opportunity for everyone. These budget minimums have limited the middle market’s autonomy and curtailed its ability to bring advertising operations under their own control. They have disincentivized these companies from developing the talent and budgeting the resources necessary to master this technology and get the most value from it. And they have kept the major DSPs from accessing the largest, most diversified, and therefore most durable segment of advertisers. Instead, middle market companies rely on media agencies (like my company, AudienceX) to manage their digital budgets, essentially acting as surrogate operators of this DSP technology. On the surface, that would seem to benefit digital agencies like us, but in the long run I’m not sure it benefits anyone.

For more such updates, check Out recent Martech Cube guest blogs.

**Pre-Wedding Photoshoots in the Andaman Islands: Capturing Memories with Scuba Diving and Parasailing**

The Andaman Islands offer a unique backdrop for pre-wedding photoshoots, combining stunning natural beauty with adventurous activities. Scuba diving and parasailing are popular choices that not only capture beautiful moments but also create a memorable bonding experience for couples.

**Scuba Diving**
Scuba diving in the Andaman Islands is a thrilling adventure. The clear waters and vibrant marine life provide a perfect setting for underwater photography. Couples can explore the coral reefs, where they can capture images of colorful fish, sea turtles, and even manta rays. The experience is not just about the photos; it’s about the shared excitement and the sense of accomplishment.

**Parasailing**
Parasailing offers a unique perspective of the island’s breathtaking landscapes. Couples can soar above the water, taking in the panoramic views of the Andaman Sea and the lush greenery of the islands. The adrenaline rush and the shared laughter make this activity a highlight of the shoot.

**Emphasizing the Bonding Experience**
To highlight the bonding experience, consider including candid shots of couples interacting during the activities. Show them laughing, holding hands, and enjoying each other’s company. You can also include a couple’s reaction to the experience, such as a smile or a hug, to convey the emotional connection.

Sure! Here’s a concise article on additive manufacturing in Dubai and its role in the automobile industry, focusing on scalability and efficiency for the economic angle:

**Additive Manufacturing in Dubai: Scalability and Efficiency in the Automotive Industry**

Dubai has been at the forefront of adopting advanced manufacturing technologies, and additive manufacturing (AM) is no exception. The Dubai 3D Printing Strategy, launched in 2018, aims to promote the use of AM in various sectors, including automotive. This strategy emphasizes scalability and efficiency, which are crucial for the economic growth of the industry.

One notable example is Inoventive, a Dubai-based company that has demonstrated the potential of AM in the automotive sector. Inoventive can produce parts in as little as a few hours, significantly reducing production times and costs compared to traditional manufacturing methods. This rapid prototyping capability is particularly valuable for the automotive industry, where quick turnaround times are essential for innovation and market responsiveness.

Inoventive’s AM capabilities have also enabled the production of lightweight components, which are critical for enhancing fuel efficiency and reducing emissions in vehicles. By using AM, manufacturers can design parts with complex geometries that are difficult to produce using conventional methods, leading to improved performance and reduced material waste.

While sustainability is not the primary focus of this article, it is worth noting that AM can contribute to more sustainable manufacturing practices. For instance, AM allows for the production of parts with minimal material waste, as only the required material is used during the printing process. Additionally, AM can help in the development of lighter and more efficient components, which can reduce the overall environmental impact of vehicles.

In conclusion, the Dubai 3D Printing Strategy is driving the adoption of AM in the automotive industry, with companies like Inoventive leading the way in terms of scalability and efficiency. As the industry continues to evolve, AM is poised to play a significant role in shaping the future of automotive manufacturing in Dubai and beyond.
</response>

Sure! Here’s a concise article on the top 5 Samsung smartphones from 2021:

### Top 5 Samsung Smartphones from 2021

#### Galaxy S21 Series
The Galaxy S21 series, released in January 2021, is a flagship lineup that includes the S21, S21+, and S21 Ultra. These devices are powered by the latest Snapdragon 888 or Exynos 2100 processors, depending on the region. The S21 and S21+ feature a 6.2-inch and 6.7-inch AMOLED displays, respectively, with a resolution of 1080p. The S21 Ultra boasts a 6.8-inch display with a 1440p resolution.

**Key Specs:**
- **Camera:** 12MP ultra-wide, 12MP wide, and 10MP telephoto lenses.
- **Battery:** 4000mAh for the S21 and S21+, 5000mAh for the S21 Ultra.
- **Unique Features:** 5G connectivity, 120Hz refresh rate, and a 10-bit color depth.

#### Galaxy Z Fold 2
Launched in August 2020, the Galaxy Z Fold 2 is a foldable smartphone that offers a unique user experience. It features a 7.6-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display for the hinge. The device is powered by the Snapdragon 865+ or Exynos 990, depending on the region.

**Key Specs:**
- **Camera:** 12MP ultra-wide, 12MP wide, and 12MP telephoto lenses.
- **Battery:** 4500mAh.
- **Unique Features:** Foldable design, 5G connectivity, and a 120Hz refresh rate.

#### Galaxy Z Flip
The Galaxy Z Flip, released in May 2020, is another foldable smartphone that offers a compact design. It features a 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and a 1.1-inch OLED display for the hinge. The device is powered by the Snapdragon 855 or Exynos 9820, depending on the region.

**Key Specs:**
- **Camera:** 12MP ultra-wide, 12MP wide, and 12MP telephoto lenses.
- **Battery:** 3300mAh.
- **Unique Features:** Foldable design, 5G connectivity, and a 120Hz refresh rate.

#### Galaxy A52 5G
The Galaxy A52 5G, released in March 2021, is a budget-friendly option in the Samsung lineup. It features a 6.5-inch Super AMOLED display with a resolution of 1080p. The device is powered by the Snapdragon 778G or Exynos 2100, depending on the region.

**Key Specs:**
- **Camera:** 12MP ultra-wide, 12MP wide, and 12MP telephoto lenses.
- **Battery:** 5000mAh.
- **Unique Features:** 5G connectivity, 120Hz refresh rate, and a 10-bit color depth.

#### Galaxy A32 5G
The Galaxy A32 5G, released in March 2021, is another budget-friendly option. It features a 6.5-inch Super AMOLED display with a resolution of 1080p. The device is powered by the Snapdragon 690 or Exynos 9611, depending on the region.

**Key Specs:**
- **Camera:** 13MP ultra-wide, 13MP wide, and 5MP telephoto lenses.
- **Battery:** 5000mAh.
- **Unique Features:** 5G connectivity, 120Hz refresh rate, and a 10-bit color depth.

### Background on Samsung
Samsung was founded in 1928 as a grocery store by Lee Byung-chul. Over the years, it has transformed into a global technology giant, becoming a leader in smartphones, semiconductors, and other electronic devices. Its commitment to innovation and quality has made it a household name in the tech industry.
</response>

Sure! Here’s a draft for your article:

**Repossession: A Social Critique of Class Tensions and Materialism**

In the upcoming horror film "Repossession," directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, the directors have cleverly crafted a narrative that mirrors the themes of *Get Out* and *Parasite*, making it a must-watch for horror enthusiasts and cinephiles alike. The film’s premise revolves around a wealthy family who unknowingly become pawns in a sinister game of manipulation, highlighting the deep-seated class tensions and materialistic excesses that underpin modern society.

**Social Critique: Class Tensions and Materialism**

*Get Out* and *Parasite* both tackled the dark underbelly of class dynamics and materialism, and "Repossession" does not disappoint. The film’s protagonist, a young woman from a lower socioeconomic background, finds herself entangled in a web of deceit orchestrated by a wealthy family. This setup allows the film to explore the psychological and emotional toll of class disparity, as well as the lengths to which people will go to maintain their status.

The film’s directorial choices, particularly the use of symbolism and visual motifs, further reinforce the social critique. For instance, the use of a car as a metaphor for freedom and escape is juxtaposed with the family’s luxurious yet oppressive home, highlighting the disparity between the two worlds. The directorial team’s ability to blend horror elements with social commentary is a testament to their skill and vision.

**Festival Buzz and Credibility**

"Repossession" has already generated significant buzz at film festivals, with critics praising its originality and execution. The film’s cast, including a mix of established actors and newcomers, adds to its appeal. Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard’s previous works, such as *The Last House*, have already garnered critical acclaim, further establishing their credibility in the horror genre.

**Distribution and Release**

The film will be released on December 2021, with distribution handled by Gravitas Ventures. This timely release ensures that audiences will have ample time to prepare for the film’s arrival, making it a must-see event for horror fans.

**Conclusion**

"Repossession" is a must-watch for anyone interested in horror films that tackle social issues. With its compelling narrative, directorial skill, and festival buzz, the film promises to be a standout entry in the genre. Don’t miss out on this thrilling and thought-provoking experience!
</response>
gts:
Repossession, produced, written and directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, will see a North America release via Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021. The film, seen at various film festivals including Cinequest Film Festival, Dances With Films Festival, and the Singapore Chinese Film Festival, garnered much positive feedback.

Video Credit: Film Threat

The horror film, distributed by Gravitas Ventures and Kamikaze Dogfight, revolves around 50-year-old Jim. Jim has managed to construct for himself a perfect life in the world’s most expensive city. Curiously, when Jim is unexpectedly laid off, he desperately clings onto the symbols of his success. Not long thereafter, plauged by his past, we find Jim wrestling with resurfacing demons.

Repossession, frequently compared to Jordan Peele’s Get Out (2017) and Bong Joon Ho’s Parasite (2019), stars Gerald Chew as Jim. Chew’s previous work includes The Tattooist (2007), Apprentice (2016), and Wonder Boy (2017). More recently, playing Tommy ‘The Scorpion’ Chow, the actor could be seen in the Dean Devlin/Gary Rosen co-created television series Almost Paradise.

Video Credit: Cinequest

Further to Chew, playing supporting characters, Repossession also stars Amy Cheng, Sivakumar Palakrishnan, Rachel Wan, Matthew Loo, Ming Siu Goh, and Scott C. Hillyard. Repossession, with Siang Seng Goh, Alex Low and Mun Yang Tham serving as co-producers, comes to Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021.

Sure! Here’s a concise article on the pros and cons of having an online business, along with two actionable tips:

### Pros of Online Businesses
1. **Global Reach**: Easily reach customers worldwide without geographical limitations.
2. **Flexibility**: Work from anywhere, allowing for a better work-life balance.
3. **Cost Efficiency**: Lower overhead costs compared to traditional brick-and-mortar stores.

### Cons of Online Businesses
1. **Cybersecurity Risks**: Increased vulnerability to hacking and data breaches.
2. **Customer Trust**: Building trust with customers can be challenging.
3. **Technical Issues**: Dependence on technology can lead to downtime and service disruptions.

### Actionable Tips
1. **Time-Blocking for Work-Life Balance**: Allocate specific times for work and personal activities to maintain a healthy balance.
2. **Budget-Friendly Tools**: Use free or low-cost tools like Google Workspace for email and document management, and consider using free hosting services for your website.

Feel free to adjust these tips to better fit your specific needs!
