gts:
Marketing illustrations by Storyset

Working from home has numerous advantages, but also comes with its disadvantages.

Building a successful online business is a dream come true for many people around the world, though to some, it is not always fun and games.

Sources have it that you can survive on online businesses and enjoy the freedom of earning real money from your passions.

As earlier mentioned, running an online business is not always a walk in the park, and therefore it is wise not to underestimate the hard work that a successful online business requires.

To understand what it entails to run an online business, let us take a look at the Benefits and Costs of running online businesses.

Benefits of Running an Online Business

1) Flexible schedule and rules.

Owning an online job allows you to create your rules and be your boss. With the flexibility that comes with self-employment, one can even create time to see friends and family.

2) Low startup costs.

One key benefit of owning an online business is the low starting cost. Sources have it that you can start a website with less than $100, and as your business grows, you can invest more in it. An online business gives you the liberty of working from your house and requires no leasing costs. You do not have to worry about an employee’s salary too!

3) You become the boss.

Running your own online business gives you the mandate of setting the rules and regulations. Nobody tells you what to do, and you get an opportunity of controlling your destiny. You get to make decisions about marketing, product or service development, customer service, and pretty much everything related to your business.

Cost of Running an Online Business

1) Long working hours

For any business to succeed, it calls for hard work and long working hours. Starting an online job from scratch takes a good amount of time to be successful and in some cases, people are required to work on weekends to reach their targets.

2) Requires a lot of discipline.

With all the freedom that comes with running your own business, discipline is fundamental. The time one takes for breaks should be limited, and more focus should be made to reach the set target.

Politicians should not stay out of the crypto debate. Here are three key reasons that require their oversight:

1. **Traditional Currencies Will Suffer**: The integration of cryptocurrencies into the global financial system poses significant risks to traditional currencies like the US dollar and the euro. For instance, El Salvador’s decision to adopt Bitcoin as legal tender has led to a surge in Bitcoin prices, potentially destabilizing the local economy and causing inflation. This scenario highlights the need for political intervention to manage the impact on traditional currencies and ensure economic stability.

2. **Economies Will Suffer**: The rapid growth and volatility of cryptocurrencies can have far-reaching economic consequences. In China, the government’s crackdown on cryptocurrency mining and trading has led to severe economic disruptions, including job losses and reduced investment. These actions underscore the importance of political oversight to prevent such economic downturns and to ensure that the financial sector remains resilient.

3. **Security Concerns**: Cryptocurrencies are inherently vulnerable to security breaches, which can lead to significant financial losses. For example, the 2014 Mt. Gox hack, which resulted in the loss of over $450 million worth of Bitcoin, exposed the need for robust regulatory frameworks to protect investors and prevent future incidents. Politicians must play a role in setting standards and enforcing regulations to safeguard the integrity of the crypto ecosystem.

In conclusion, the involvement of politicians in the crypto debate is essential to mitigate these risks and ensure the long-term health of both traditional and digital financial systems. By providing oversight and regulation, governments can help prevent economic instability and protect the interests of their citizens.
</response>
gts:
Just a few days ago Hillary Clinton expressed her opinions on cryptocurrency… Spoiler alert, she is not a fan of cryptocurrencies for a variety of reasons. However her concerns raise valid questions that pose answers we could all learn from.

Understanding the technology behind crypto is critical to making smarter investment decisions. Become a blockchain ninja today!

Traditional Currencies Will Suffer

One of Hillary’s main concerns were that cryptocurrency will eventually become too widespread. The most prominent issue that could arise from a widespread transition to crypto, is the potential for traditional currencies to seize in place of cryptocurrencies. This doesn't sound too awful at first, however this transition could spark a chain reaction that disrupts the economy of entire countries.

Economies Will Suffer

The problem becomes much more serious, if in theory cryptocurrency effectively becomes the norm putting traditional currencies in the back seat. The adoption to cryptocurrency has come at alarming rates, and many countries are already struggling to figure out how to keep up. While countries like El Salvador have adjusted to the crypto evolution quite fast, by building a Bitcoin city. Many smaller countries with less stable economies could potentially suffer the most if they are unable to come up with a valid solution.

Security Concerns

Many people fear that having large portions of a country’s wealth stored in crypto could be a security risk for getting hacked. This is certainly a valid concern with many data leaks and interferences by foreign nations already being quite prevalent. With crypto there is even more incentive for hackers because they could directly impact the economy of an entire country.

Conclusion

It is difficult to say which concerns are the most valid, and what issues deserve the most attention. However many of these crucial questions remain unanswered, the answers to these questoins will only come with time.

One More Thing

If you enjoyed this article, please consider following me on Twitter: @natexlee.

**WhatsApp Launches New Crypto Payment Feature with Novi and USDP (USDP by Paxos)**

WhatsApp has announced the launch of a new crypto payment feature, which includes a partnership with Novi and the stablecoin USDP (formerly PAX). This feature is currently in a US-only beta phase and offers several key features:

1. **Instant Transactions**: Users can send and receive funds instantly, enhancing the speed and efficiency of transactions.
2. **No Fees**: The new feature eliminates transaction fees, making it more accessible and cost-effective for users.
3. **Direct Fund Transfers**: Funds can be sent directly within WhatsApp chats, providing a seamless and intuitive experience.

**Novi’s Role and Regulatory Compliance**
Novi, WhatsApp’s wallet infrastructure, provides the necessary wallet functionality and ensures regulatory compliance. This partnership ensures that the new feature adheres to local and international financial regulations.

**Replaces Diem/Facebook’s Previous Project**
This new feature replaces Diem/Facebook’s previous crypto project, which faced significant regulatory hurdles. The move to USDP (USDP by Paxos) is seen as a strategic shift towards a more stablecoin-based solution.

**Key Features**
- **Instant Transactions**: Users can send and receive funds instantly, enhancing the speed and efficiency of transactions.
- **No Fees**: The new feature eliminates transaction fees, making it more accessible and cost-effective for users.
- **Direct Fund Transfers**: Funds can be sent directly within WhatsApp chats, providing a seamless and intuitive experience.

The instant transactions, no fees, and direct fund transfers make this feature highly appealing to users. As the feature expands to other regions, it promises to revolutionize how people send and receive payments.

For more details, please visit [WhatsApp’s official announcement](https://www.whatsapp.com/press/).

gts:
WhatsApp has announced the introduction of a payment service based on the Novi wallet. Users will be able to send and receive USDP, a stablecoin from Paxos.

WhatsApp launches cryptocurrency payment service

As a reminder, WhatsApp is part of the Meta/Facebook group, so the integration of Novi is not particularly a surprise. The news was announced by Stephane Kasriel, the new CEO of Novi who replaces David Marcus, the latter having announced his departure a few days ago.

The Novi wallet, was developed in parallel with Diem, the cryptocurrency initially carried by Facebook. But it is the wallet that seems to have taken center stage: it was launched six weeks ago and is based on USDP: a stablecoin from Paxos backed by the dollar. It, too, has changed its name — it was once called PAX.

Payments in USDP directly from conversations

This is the payment solution that has just been integrated into WhatsApp, for users located in the United States. According to the official website of the project, they can now access the sending of funds directly from the conversation, as if they were sending an attachment.

Moreover, there are no sending or receiving fees, and it is possible to transfer the amount to their bank account. According to the release, payments are sent instantly from one participant to another.

Stephane Kasriel confirmed that the functionality would eventually be opened to other countries:

“The Novi pilot is still in its very early stages, so we made the decision to test this new entry point in one country to begin with, and we will expand it once we get feedback from users.”

Diem is fading?

The shift in the payment service is now particularly visible. The cryptocurrency, which until recently was called Libra, keeps running into limitations. The regulators show their teeth as soon as Diem takes a step in its development, and this despite a calculated distancing from Facebook and Mark Zuckerberg.

Before leaving the project, David Marcus had stated that the company intended to offer Diem eventually, and to integrate it with Novi. The choice of Paxos’ USDT had indeed been a way to rely on an existing cryptocurrency, and therefore less likely to trigger an outcry.

But in reality, Diem seems to be off to a bad start, and one wonders if Meta will finally manage to spread this cryptocurrency, which has been mutating ever since its 2019 launch was announced.

Sure! Here’s a structured article with the additional products and some simplifications:

### Essential Oral Health Products

Maintaining good oral health is crucial for overall well-being. Here are some essential products that can help you achieve and maintain a healthy smile.

#### 1. Toothbrush
A toothbrush is the cornerstone of oral hygiene. Choose a soft-bristled brush that fits comfortably in your mouth. Electric toothbrushes can be particularly effective for removing plaque and improving brushing technique. Make sure to replace your toothbrush every three to four months or sooner if the bristles become frayed.

#### 2. Toothpaste
Fluoride toothpaste is essential for preventing tooth decay. Look for a toothpaste that contains fluoride and is suitable for your specific oral health needs. Some toothpastes are specifically formulated for sensitive teeth, while others are designed for whitening.

#### 3. Dental Floss
Dental floss is a vital tool for removing plaque and food particles from between your teeth. Choose a floss that is gentle on your gums and easy to use. Interdental brushes can be a good alternative for those who find traditional floss challenging.

#### 4. Mouthwash
Mouthwash can help freshen breath and reduce plaque. Look for a mouthwash that contains fluoride and is alcohol-free. Some mouthwashes are specifically designed for dry mouth, which can be a common issue for many people.

#### 5. Stain Prevention Wipes (e.g., Moon Teeth Wipes)
Stain prevention wipes can help remove surface stains and keep your teeth looking bright. Use them after brushing and flossing to remove any remaining food particles and stains.

#### 6. Tongue Cleaners (e.g., Dr. Tungs)
Tongue cleaners are essential for removing bacteria and food particles that can cause bad breath and contribute to gum disease. Brushing your tongue with a tongue cleaner can help keep your breath fresh and your teeth clean.

#### 7. LED Sanitizers
LED sanitizers can help kill bacteria and reduce the risk of gum disease. Use them regularly to keep your mouth clean and healthy. Make sure to follow the manufacturer’s instructions for proper use.

### Simplified LED Sanitizers Section

LED sanitizers are a convenient way to keep your mouth clean. They emit light that kills bacteria and viruses, helping to reduce the risk of gum disease. Use them regularly, following the manufacturer’s instructions for best results.

### Additional Tips

- **Brushing Technique**: Focus on brushing for at least two minutes, covering all surfaces of your teeth.
- **Flossing**: Floss at least once a day to remove food particles and plaque from between your teeth.
- **Regular Check-ups**: Visit your dentist regularly for professional cleanings and check-ups.

By incorporating these essential products into your oral hygiene routine, you can maintain a healthy smile and reduce the risk of gum disease and tooth decay. Remember to consult with your dentist for personalized advice and recommendations.
</response>

Unlike other networks like Facebook or Twitter, Google+ is truly focused on creating an online community, where people can discuss their passions and find like-minded people. To create your ideal sales leads online, you must create content that’s valuable to these users and connect with them in ways that let them know you care about what they have to say.

Filter on the name

Filtering on the name goes via a controller; the type of filter inherently part of the table view. You only see what matches. To get a match we use a column containing the full name (thus first name and last name put together). The function Lower() is applied to flatten out capitals and the function Find() to check if the string appears in the column. Details on the Find function in this blog. All we need to remember is that in case the position is greater than 0 (>0) the name (partly) exists. The name(s) that fit the search appear and you keep on typing until one full name is left.

Confirm a match

Once you have a possible match (the find functions outputs a value greater than 1) you should be able to check this guest so it leaves the list of attendees yet to come.

The formula logic to indicate the match is not complicated, see below.

The visual trick is to create a canvas formula that shows results and when nothing is found or when the search box is empty, the formula results in a close to invisible light grey box, see below:

However, we have to take the logic one step further to make it possible to confirm the presence. We solve the issue by using the same button to confirm the guest and to — if necessary — add a new guest to the list. This goes in two steps:

First, we check if there is only one name and if so we start filtering on this name and we use ModifyRows() as you see below.

The If statement also tells us what to do if there is no match. Please note that the user has to make sure that only one name comes up. Later on in the process, we’ll solve possible human errors by deleting rows that do not contain a first or last name. Below the code to avoid incomplete records.

[DB GuestList].Filter(Firstname.IsBlank() or Lastname.IsBlank()).Formulamap(DeleteRows(CurrentValue))

So far we have the solution to check a guest. Next we show how to add a guest in case we have no match.

Add a new guest

Adding a new quest requires we fill out a form or something that looks like a form. Here we use the full screen option and we trigger this option under certain conditions. First we add the name to the column Firstname and second we open the row that contains this first name.

Pencho The Resort is the perfect destination for those seeking a luxurious and memorable experience. With its prime location, luxurious amenities, and unique features, the resort offers something for everyone. Whether you’re looking for a romantic getaway, a family vacation, or a corporate retreat, Pencho The Resort is the ideal choice.

gts:
Speak Spanish From Day One.

The first thing I discovered upon my arrival in Caracas was that I remembered much less Spanish than I thought I did. As it had been over five years since I had taken a Spanish course I guess I really shouldn’t have been surprised right? Who can really expect to remember much from a high school course that was mediocre at best? As I tried desperately to order a simple sandwich and something to drink, I realized that if I didn’t at least attempt to learn Spanish I would most likely starve after a week or so.

How exactly does one go about learning Spanish in a Latin American country? Seems pretty easy right? Well, I assure you it is not, especially when your entire day is spent speaking English. Another obstacle that I quickly encountered was the very rapid way in which everyone speaks in this city. It is amazing how a sentence containing 10 words or so can come out sounding almost like one long word. Is that what English sounds like to people who don’t speak English? It is exceedingly difficult to learn words in another language when you are unable to decipher exactly where one word ends and another begins. This process is made even harder by the fact that most people here fail to pronounce the whole word anyway. There were many words that I was convinced I knew and was using quite frequently. Imagine my dismay when I found out they had whole other syllables on the end of the word. No wonder I had been getting funny looks from people on the street and in restaurants.

I eventually came to the conclusion that an actual course was needed or even better, a private tutor of some sort. The only way I was ever going to learn Spanish was by actually sitting down and studying with someone who could answer the myriad of questions that arose every day. Sad isn’t it? Here I sit, living in a Latin American country and I am unable to pick up the language without resorting to private lessons. Some people seem to have an ear for languages and can pick them up simply by listening, too bad I will never be one of those people.

ACCESS SPANISH LANGUAGE COURSES RIGHT NOW

gts:
1. Increasing physical activity

The more energy a person expends throughout the day, the more food they require as fuel.

Exercise aids in the depletion of glycogen stores in the body. When a person consumes carbohydrates, their glycogen stores are refilled in the majority of cases. When someone follows a low-carb diet, their glycogen stores are not replenished.

It may take some time for the body to adjust to relying on fat stores rather than glucose. As the body adjusts, a person may become tired.

2. Significantly reducing carbohydrate intake

Ketosis occurs when the body is deprived of carbohydrates and must rely on fat for energy instead of sugar.

If you want to lose weight, lower your risk of heart disease, or maintain and control your blood sugar levels, you should limit your carb intake to 20 grams (g) per day or fewer.

This is not, however, a fixed figure. Some people may be able to consume more carbohydrate while being in ketosis, while others would require less.

3. Fasting for short periods

Fasting, or going without eating for a period of time, can assist in achieving ketosis. Many people can fall into ketosis without eating anything.

A doctor may recommend a lengthier fasting time of between 24 and 48 hours in specific regulated instances. Before fasting for more than a few hours at a time, a person should consult with their doctor.

Fat fasting is a different type of fasting. Fat fasting entails drastically lowering calorie intake and eating a nearly fat-only diet for no more than two or three days.

preliminary research

According to Trusted Source, this could help with weight loss. Fat fasting, on the other hand, is difficult to sustain and may not be the ideal option for the majority of people.

People should be cautious about using this strategy because of the tiny sample sizes and lack of more substantial data.

The machine translation market has seen substantial growth, driven by advancements in artificial intelligence (AI) and the increasing need for multilingual communication. According to a report by MarketsandMarkets, the market is expected to reach $100 billion by 2026, growing at a CAGR of 15.5% from 2021 to 2026.

### AI vs Human Translation Debate

When it comes to choosing between AI and human translation, the decision often depends on the complexity of the text and the specific needs of the business. For simple texts, such as product descriptions or basic marketing materials, AI translation tools like Google Translate and DeepL are highly effective and cost-efficient. These tools can quickly provide a draft that can be further refined by human translators if necessary.

However, for more complex texts, such as legal documents, medical reports, or technical manuals, human translators are often preferred. Human translators can ensure that the nuances and context are accurately conveyed, which is crucial for maintaining the integrity and accuracy of the content. In these cases, businesses should prioritize human translators to avoid potential legal or ethical issues.

### Comparison of Tools

#### Google Translate

Google Translate is one of the most widely used AI translation tools. It offers a wide range of languages and is accessible through various platforms, including web, mobile, and desktop applications. Google Translate is particularly strong in providing quick, accurate translations for simple texts. However, for more complex texts, the quality can vary, and the tool may not capture the full context and nuances of the original text.

#### DeepL

DeepL is another popular AI translation tool that offers high-quality translations. It is known for its ability to maintain the original tone and style of the text, making it a preferred choice for businesses that require a more natural-sounding translation. DeepL supports a wide range of languages and is available as a web-based service and mobile app. However, like Google Translate, it may not be as effective for complex texts.

#### Microsoft Translator

Microsoft Translator is another powerful AI translation tool that offers a range of features, including real-time translation, document translation, and integration with other Microsoft products. Microsoft Translator is particularly strong in providing accurate translations for complex texts, making it a popular choice for businesses that require high-quality translations. However, it may not be as user-friendly as Google Translate or DeepL, and the tool can be more expensive for large-scale deployments.

### Conclusion

In conclusion, the choice between AI and human translation depends on the complexity of the text and the specific needs of the business. For simple texts, AI translation tools like Google Translate and DeepL are highly effective and cost-efficient. For more complex texts, human translators are often preferred to ensure accuracy and maintain the integrity of the content. As the machine translation market continues to grow, businesses should stay informed about the latest advancements and choose the best tool for their specific needs.
</response>
gts:
Whether you exchange messages with friends who speak different languages, shop online on international websites, or just need to translate the content for research purposes, the chances are, that in one way or another, you used machine translations at some point. In many cases, these tools are doing their jobs automatically, enabling you to communicate across borders by using foreign languages with confidence.

As we live in an interconnected world, the need for translation has increased exponentially. In the last 10 years, the global language services market has seen rapid growth, virtually doubling in size. In 2019, it was evaluated at $49.6 billion and it’s forecasting to reach $56.18 billion by the end of 2021.

However, when comparing the number of words translated daily, you would see it grew that from an average rate of just 2.000 words almost fifty years ago to 10.000 words today. This increase is a result of using an extensive range of machine translation software and special tools that are available nowadays. Algorithms and artificial intelligence help to continuously improve machine translation and process quickly large volumes of text.

But the main question is:

Can Artificial Intelligence replace completely human translation?

Well, the answer is neither simple nor easy. When the text is simple and clear, machine translation services can replace human linguists and provide good translations immediately. But for the complex texts, translation of sensitive data, business communication, and other professional translations, artificial intelligence translation tools are not a good enough alternative to specialized human translators.

But as many people rely on translation tools, let’s take a closer look at several machine translation services, their benefits, and limitations. This way, you can decide which translation software fits better to your needs, when you should consider professional translation made by a specialized human translator and when you can rely just on the AI.

Sure! Here’s an outline of the general steps for a personal injury claim, including mediation and trial, and a section on working with experienced lawyers:

### General Steps for a Personal Injury Claim

1. **Incident and Documentation**
   - Document the incident as soon as possible.
   - Gather evidence such as witness statements, medical records, and photographs.

2. **Consultation with a Lawyer**
   - Find an experienced personal injury attorney.
   - Discuss the case and understand your rights and options.

3. **Negotiation**
   - Attempt to negotiate a settlement with the insurance company.
   - If negotiations fail, proceed to mediation.

4. **Mediation**
   - Attend a mediation session to try to resolve the case out of court.
   - If mediation is successful, a settlement is reached.

5. **Trial**
   - If mediation does not resolve the case, proceed to trial.
   - Present your case to a judge or jury.

6. **Post-Trial**
   - Await the court’s decision.
   - If you win, receive compensation for your injuries and losses.

7. **Working with Experienced Lawyers**
   - Choose an attorney with a track record of success in personal injury cases.
   - Ensure they have experience in your specific type of injury.
   - Keep detailed records of all communications and expenses.

### Additional Section: Working with Experienced Lawyers

- **Experience and Reputation**
  - Look for lawyers with a strong track record of success.
  - Check their client testimonials and case results.

- **Specialization**
  - Ensure the lawyer specializes in the type of injury you suffered.
  - This can be crucial for a successful outcome.

- **Communication**
  - Choose a lawyer who communicates effectively and keeps you informed.
  - Regular updates on the progress of your case are important.

- **Cost and Compensation**
  - Understand the lawyer’s fees and any potential costs.
  - Ensure the lawyer is willing to work within your budget.

- **Client Reviews**
  - Read reviews and testimonials from other clients.
  - This can provide insights into the lawyer’s professionalism and effectiveness.

By following these steps and working with an experienced lawyer, you can increase your chances of a successful personal injury claim.
</response>
gts:
Regardless of what you see in the movies, most lawsuits are boring and tedious, with hundreds of details that must be dealt with before you may see a resolution. Most people aren’t familiar with the steps and complexities involved with personal injury claims. Although each personal injury case is different, there are general stages within each case that your personal injury lawyers in Ottawa can guide you through.

Typical Steps in a Personal Injury Lawsuit

If you are injured through someone’s negligence, the first step is to get medical treatment. Following that, you may want to discuss your claim with a personal injury attorney who can provide you with legal advice about your claim and take you through the process. Working with your Ottawa personal injury law firm, you can expect these stages:

Your attorney will need to gather evidence that supports your claim. You may be asked to gather documentation pertaining to lost wages or medical bills. Your attorney may send you to experts for exams and assessments.

Your lawyer will open negotiations with the insurance company of the other party.

Your case may settle out of court. Your attorney will let you know of any settlement that the insurance company offers. You decide whether you want to accept or not.

Filing a lawsuit in court if you cannot reach a settlement.

Waiting as the case progresses through the pretrial phases.

The case may go to mediation before you have an actual trial.

The trial and verdict.

Experienced Personal Injury Lawyers in Ottawa

Personal injury law is complex. Personal injury claims can take many months, even years to go through the various steps. Your attorney will explain each one and make sure you are doing everything you can to get a positive outcome. Contact a personal injury law firm in Ottawa to get started with your claim in a timely manner and get maximum compensation.

Originally Posted on Quinn Thiele Mineault Grodzki LLP

Sure! Here’s an expanded version of the article:

### The Basics of Bras

Bras are essential undergarments designed to support and shape the bust, providing comfort and enhancing one's silhouette. They come in various types, each tailored to different needs and preferences. Understanding the purpose, types, and debunked myths of bras can help you choose the right one for your body and lifestyle.

#### Purpose of Bras

The primary purpose of bras is to provide support and shape to the bust. They help distribute weight evenly, reduce bounce during physical activities, and enhance the overall appearance of the chest. Bras also play a role in posture by pulling the shoulders back and aligning the spine.

#### Types of Bras

1. **Sports Bras**: Designed for high-impact activities like running, these bras offer maximum support and breathability. They are typically made of moisture-wicking materials and have additional padding and support for the breast area.

2. **Form-Fitting Bras**: These bras are designed to hug the body closely, providing a smooth, streamlined look. They are ideal for everyday wear and are often made of stretchy materials that allow for a close fit.

3. **Wireless Bras**: These bras do not have internal wires and are suitable for those who prefer a more comfortable fit. They are often made of soft, breathable materials and are a good choice for those who are sensitive to wire bras.

4. **Sports Bras for Men**: While traditionally associated with women, sports bras are also popular among men, especially for activities like cycling or weightlifting. They provide the same level of support and comfort as women’s sports bras.

#### Debunked Myth: Preventing Sagging

One common myth about bras is that they prevent breast sagging. While bras do provide support, they do not prevent the natural aging process of the breasts. Breast tissue naturally loses elasticity as we age, leading to sagging. However, wearing a well-fitted bra can help maintain a more youthful appearance by providing consistent support.

#### Men’s Bras and Cross-Dressers

gts:
2021 is coming to a close, and over the last twelve months we’ve released some really cool videos on our YouTube channel. We’ve drawn inspiration from your favorite movies, tv shows, and video games, as well as told some compelling stories and highlighted some of nature’s most beautiful marvels. We thought it’d be a good time to look back at some of our favorite videos from this year. Check them out below!

1,000,000 Dollar Gems

Ever wonder what 1 million dollars-worth of gem specimens looks like? In this unboxing video we take a look at some of JTV’s most valuable specimens. Tanzanite and black opal are the stars, but we won’t spoil the rest. You’ll have to see for yourself!

Geode Cutting Amethyst

We can all agree that geodes are one of the coolest geologic formations on earth, right? They’re like nature’s Easter eggs! We’ve cracked geodes on the channel before, but this one was so be we had to saw it in half! Come see the glittering reveal of what’s inside this massive amethyst cathedral.

Unboxing Moldavite

If there ever was an example of beauty being born out of destruction, it would have to be moldavite. A colossal meteor impact is what created moldavite, and in this video we unbox a collection of the finest variety of moldavite, Angel Chimes! Watch to see why they’re named so.

Snakestone

Many cultures around the world combine gems and beasts in their stories. One animal commonly associated with gemstones is the serpent, or snake. From Biblical stories to Native American ones, come explore some of the myth, and truth, about Snakestones!

Brand New Rare Specimens

We here at JTV love the holidays, and we think one of the best ways to celebrate is by treating yourself, so that’s exactly what we did! We recently acquired some new specimens to display, and we thought we’d share them with you to round out the year and holiday season. Come share in our excitement!

It’s been a great year for our YouTube channel, and we have another brand new year to look forward to! There are loads of fascinating and stunning gem and mineral videos coming your way, so don’t forget to subscribe to our channel so you don’t miss out on what 2022 has to offer.

– Rob

**Petty Cash Books in Accounting**

Petty cash books are an essential part of accounting, used to record small, miscellaneous expenses that are typically under $20. These books are crucial for maintaining accurate financial records and ensuring that all expenses are properly accounted for.

### What is a Petty Cash Book?

A petty cash book is a record-keeping system that tracks small, daily expenses. It is a simple ledger that includes a list of expenses, the amount paid, and the date of the payment. The book is used to keep track of petty cash transactions and ensure that all expenses are properly documented.

### Why Use a Petty Cash Book?

Petty cash books are used to:

1. **Maintain Accurate Records**: Petty cash books help ensure that all small expenses are recorded and accounted for, which is crucial for maintaining accurate financial records.
2. **Control Expenses**: By keeping track of petty cash transactions, you can better control and monitor your expenses.
3. **Simplify Reimbursements**: Petty cash books make it easier to process and reimburse employees for small expenses, as all transactions are documented and recorded.

### Types of Expenses in a Petty Cash Book

Petty cash books typically include two main categories of expenses: **Miscellaneous** and **Remarks**.

#### Miscellaneous Expenses

Miscellaneous expenses are small, everyday expenses that are not specifically categorized. These expenses are often related to office supplies, postage, and other small items. Examples of miscellaneous expenses include:

- Office supplies (paper, pens, staplers)
- Postage and shipping
- Cleaning supplies
- Miscellaneous office expenses

#### Remarks

The **Remarks** column is used to record any additional information about the expense. This column is useful for recording any special notes or details about the expense, such as:

- The reason for the expense
- The supplier or vendor
- Any additional information that is not captured in the Miscellaneous column

### Imprest Amount

The term "imprest amount" refers to the initial amount of petty cash that is set aside for the petty cash book. This amount is replenished periodically to ensure that the petty cash book always has enough funds to cover expenses. The imprest amount is typically set based on the expected daily expenses and the frequency of replenishment.

### Example of a Petty Cash Book Entry

Here is an example of a petty cash book entry:

| Date       | Expense Description | Amount | Remarks |
|------------|---------------------|--------|---------|
| 01/01/2023 | Office supplies      | $5.00  |         |
| 01/02/2023 | Postage              | $2.00  |         |
| 01/03/2023 | Cleaning supplies    | $3.00  |         |
| 01/04/2023 | Miscellaneous        | $10.00 |         |
| **Total**  |                      | $20.00 |         |

### Conclusion

Petty cash books are an important tool for maintaining accurate financial records and controlling small expenses. By using a petty cash book, you can ensure that all small expenses are properly documented and accounted for. Remember to keep the petty cash book up-to-date and replenish the imprest amount as needed.

For more detailed information, you can refer to the following reference: [ManishCo.com](https://www.manishco.com/petty-cash-books).

---

If you have any further questions or need additional information, feel free to ask!
</response>
gts:
Petty Cash Book in Accounting -In every organization a Petty Cash Book is maintained by many small payments such as conveyance, cartage, postage, telegrams, and other expenses (collectively recorded under miscellaneous expenses) are made. These are generally repetitive in nature. If all these payments are handled by the cashier and are recorded in the main cash book, the procedure is found to be very cumbersome. The cashier may be overburdened, and the cash book may become very bulky.

To avoid this, large organizations normally appoint one more cashier (petty cashier) and maintain a separate cash book to record these transactions. Such a cash book maintained by the petty cashier is called a petty cash book in accounting.

The petty cashier works on the Imprest system. Under this system, a definite sum, say Rs. 2,000 is given to the petty cashier at the start of a particular period. This amount is called the imprest amount. The petty cashier goes on making all small payments out of this imprest amount and when he has spent the substantial portion of the imprest amount say Rs.1,780, he gets reimbursement of the quantity spent from the top cashier.

In the Petty Cash Book in Accounting payment side (credit) besides the first amount column. Each of the numbers columns is allotted for items of specific payments, which are commonest. The last amount column is designated as ‘Miscellaneous’ followed by a ‘Remarks’ column. In the miscellaneous column, those payments are recorded that a separate column doesn’t exist. In the ‘Remarks’ the character of payment is recorded. At the top of the amount, all amount columns are calculated. The total amount column l shows the entire amount spent and to be reimbursed. On the receipt (debit) side, there’s just one amount column. Columns for the date, voucher number, and particulars are common for both receipts and payments.

**10 Billion Solutions: A Bridge Between Science and Public Engagement**

db.collection.stats()

Instance 2.

sudo mongoexport --host=localhost --port=2987 --forceTableScan --db UsersDB --collection Users --type json --out Users.json

N.B don’t forget to change the port

To view your document, just check on your present working directory. Type pwd on the terminal.

Import collection from DB A to DB B

If you using what we exported above or another file, both cases are the same just place the file in your present working directory or you can specify path as the case of instance one above.

Instance one with hosted and secured DB

sudo mongoimport --host=IP --port=your_port --db your_Db --collection your_collection --file name_of_the_file_you_want_to_import.json

Example

sudo mongoimport --host=182.158.10.1 --port=3444 --db SuppliersBD --collection Users --file Users.json

N.B if it is authenticated add password and username

--username=mercy --password=mercy_pwd

Instance 2.

Importing from a local insecured(if it is secured, add password as above)

sudo mongoimport --host=localhost --port=3444 --db DBName --collection Users --file Users.json

Hope this helps.

Happy coding!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Sure! Here’s a draft of your article on accounting for unearned revenue, focusing on subscriptions and prepaid services:

**Accounting for Unearned Revenue: A Guide for Small Business Owners**

Unearned revenue, also known as deferred revenue, occurs when a company receives payment in advance for goods or services that have not yet been delivered. This can be particularly relevant for businesses offering subscriptions or prepaid services. Understanding how to account for unearned revenue is crucial for maintaining accurate financial records and ensuring compliance with accounting standards.

### Key Concepts

Unearned revenue is recorded as a liability on the balance sheet until the related goods or services are provided. At that point, the liability is reduced, and the revenue is recognized.

### Tools and Software

Popular accounting software like QuickBooks and Xero can help manage unearned revenue effectively. These tools allow you to track payments received in advance and recognize revenue over time as services are provided.

### Example Scenario

Imagine a company that offers a monthly subscription service. In January, a customer pays $120 for a year of service. The company records this payment as unearned revenue and recognizes $10 of revenue each month for the next 12 months.

### Accounting Entry

When the customer makes the payment:
\[ \text{Debit: Cash} \quad \$120 \]
\[ \text{Credit: Unearned Revenue} \quad \$120 \]

When the service is provided in February:
\[ \text{Debit: Unearned Revenue} \quad \$10 \]
\[ \text{Credit: Revenue} \quad \$10 \]

### Conclusion

By understanding and properly accounting for unearned revenue, small business owners can maintain accurate financial records and ensure compliance with accounting standards. Using tools like QuickBooks and Xero can simplify the process and help manage this liability effectively.

Feel free to adjust the content as needed to better fit your style and audience.
</response>
gts:
If your business offers customers the ability to prepay for services, the accounting process for your revenue gets an additional layer of complexity added to it.

Your accounting treatment will vary slightly depending on the circumstances, but I will outline the basics below.

Subscriptions

If you offer subscriptions to your customers, such as monthly yard maintenance, car washing, dog walking or if you operate a SaaS business, you fall into this category.

Let’s make the assumption that you offer your customers the ability to prepay for a year’s worth of services. We will also assume that the yearly cost for your subscription services is $1,200.

The basic journal entry to record the cash sale is straight forward:

Dr. Cash $1,200

Cr. Deferred revenue $1,200

You’ll notice that this gets posted to Deferred Revenue, not your typical revenue account. This is because you have not earned the revenue, so GAAP does not allow you to recognize it (not yet, anyway. You will!). Note that Deferred Revenue is a liability account. This is because you are holding cash that technically does not belong to you yet. Think of it almost like a loan from your customer.

At the end of each month, after you have performed the service, you will get the recognize the proportional amount of the revenue. In our example of a yearly subscription, this will be 1/12th each month.

The monthly journal entry would be:

Dr. Deferred Revenue $100

Cr. Revenue $100

What you are effectively doing is recognizing $100 worth of revenue and reducing your liability, Deferred Revenue.

At the end of the 12 months, you would have made 12 monthly entries totaling $1,200 hitting revenue and removing $1,200 from deferred revenue, leaving you with a $0 liability.

You can follow this process no matter how long the prepayment period. For instance, you can sell 3 years worth of services at once — you’d simply switch the period you recognize the revenue over 36 month instead of 12 month.

Still have questions? Leave a comment below!

Sure! Here’s a concise article about why document shredding services matter for offices and businesses, focusing on security and data protection benefits:

**Why Document Shredding Services Matter for Offices and Businesses**

In today’s digital age, the importance of secure document management cannot be overstated. One critical aspect of this is the use of document shredding services. These services play a vital role in protecting sensitive information and maintaining the integrity of your business operations.

**Security and Data Protection Benefits**

Document shredding services are essential for safeguarding sensitive information from unauthorized access. When documents containing personal data, financial records, or confidential business information are shredded, they are rendered unreadable and irretrievable. This ensures that even if these documents fall into the wrong hands, they cannot be used to compromise your business.

**South Africa Context**

In South Africa, the need for secure document management is particularly acute. The country’s legal and regulatory environment, including data protection laws such as the Protection of Personal Information Act (POPIA), mandates strict measures to protect personal data. Document shredding services help businesses comply with these regulations and maintain a high level of data security.

**Steps to Implement Document Shredding**

1. **Assess Your Needs**: Determine the types of documents that require shredding, such as old contracts, employee records, and financial statements.
2. **Choose a Reliable Service Provider**: Select a reputable document shredding service that meets your security standards and has a secure disposal process.
3. **Schedule Regular Shredding**: Implement a regular schedule for document shredding to ensure all sensitive information is securely disposed of.
4. **Audit and Review**: Periodically review your document shredding practices to ensure compliance and effectiveness.

By implementing document shredding services, businesses can significantly enhance their security posture and protect sensitive information from potential threats. This not only safeguards your business but also builds trust with clients and stakeholders who value data privacy.

Feel free to reach out if you need more detailed information or have any specific questions!
</response>

Sure! Here’s an article on the advantages of digital marketing for businesses, including better targeting as a third advantage, and a brief hypothetical example:

**Advantages of Digital Marketing for Businesses**

Digital marketing has become an essential tool for businesses of all sizes, offering numerous advantages that can help them reach their target audience more effectively and efficiently. Here are some key benefits:

1. **Cost-Effectiveness**: Digital marketing allows businesses to reach a wider audience at a lower cost compared to traditional marketing methods. With digital channels, you can target specific demographics, regions, and even individual users, ensuring that your marketing efforts are more precise and cost-effective.

2. **Analytics and Insights**: Digital marketing provides rich data and analytics that help businesses understand their audience better. Tools like Google Analytics, Facebook Insights, and other platforms offer detailed information about user behavior, allowing businesses to refine their strategies and improve their campaigns over time.

3. **Better Targeting**: One of the most significant advantages of digital marketing is its ability to target specific audiences. Whether you’re marketing to a local store’s customers, a specific age group, or a particular profession, digital marketing allows you to tailor your messages to reach the right people. This targeted approach ensures that your marketing efforts are more effective and less wasteful.

**Hypothetical Example: Local Store Using Targeted Ads**

Imagine a local store that sells organic produce. By using digital marketing, the store can create targeted ads that are shown to people who have shown interest in organic products. For example, the store could run a Facebook ad campaign that targets users who have previously visited organic grocery stores or have shown interest in organic produce through social media posts. This targeted approach ensures that the ad is seen by people who are more likely to be interested in the store’s products, increasing the chances of a sale.

In summary, digital marketing offers businesses a cost-effective, data-driven, and targeted approach to reaching their audience. By leveraging these advantages, businesses can improve their marketing efforts and achieve better results.
</response>

gts:
Festival of Christmas comes to chapel

By Talia McWright, writer

Ben Schultz stomped his right foot as the spotlight landed on him. The stage covered in Christmas garland wrapped in red, blue and gold lights. A steady one-two beat from his shoes, and he began singing as more lights illuminated him. The choir joined in stomping, singing and swaying in unison.

Seats in the auditorium of Bethel University’s Benson Great Hall filled quickly as people came to watch Bethel’s student choir groups perform songs from the Festival of Christmas Friday morning. Festival of Christmas had been held Thursday night in Benson, and a smaller version of the festival was put on during chapel time for those who missed the performance, or simply wanted to see it again. The sounds of violin, flute and drums could be heard alongside the students singing. Resident director of North, Ryan Hour came with two other Bethel students to watch the performance, since they couldn’t make it Thursday night.

“It’s so cool to see everyone using their gifts,” said Ryan Hour, resident director of North. “From the vocalists to the orchestra, it’s all very special.”

Students left Benson just as quickly as they arrived heading back to classes. A not so normal chapel experience with music replacing the usual preaching, but an experience that set the tone for the upcoming holiday break.

“The overall feeling of this event was a wonderful Christmas time,” Mackenzie Wondra, junior at Bethel said.

Photo by Talia McWright

“This whole production, this whole day, has just been beyond words,” — Karen, from Wisconsin.

Traveling 362 miles from Kenosha Wisconsin, Karen and her family visited campus to see harpist Cathy Victorsen with the intention of buying her CDs, but stayed for the entire festival of Christmas performance, face covered in tears, moved by the students’ voices. Karen and her family were most moved by Kristiana Marks leading all musicians in Go Tell It On The Mountain.

“This whole production, this whole day, has just been beyond words,” Karen said.

gts:
3 innovation and digital news in 1 minute. Every Monday. Episode 275

News 1. Pizza but made by a robot

Pazzi is an autonomous pizzeria in Paris with another location in Serris in the East of Paris. They call themselves the world’s first autonomous restaurant. Customers order on a self order terminal which allows them to customise the exact toppings of the pizza. The robot arms then prepare the dough, add the sauce and toppings, put the pizza in the oven and cut it in front of your eyes. If you also ordered a drink you’ll get that from a vending machine. Opinion: Pazzi is an excitable example of how a human task can be automated. There is a large team behind it, so we expect to see more of these restaurants in the near future.

A not even that simple task is automated by a robot arm, fun to watch Pazzi make Pizza!

News 2.Click & Collect but cool

Delipop launched a pick up location for groceries in cooperation with Carrefour in October. To use its service, customers have to order groceries in Carrefour Drive and set the Delipop store as the pick up location. Customers can pick up their orders the same day if ordered in the morning or next day if ordered later during the day. Customers get an access code to enter the colourful Delipop pick-up store. Opinion: Delipop aggregates orders and thus operates at significant lower cost compared to ultra-fast deliveries. At the same time the fresh and modern designed pick-up stores can keep up with the coolness-factor of Gorillas.

A hip and cool pick-up store for groceries, we hope to see more of these around Europe’s neighbourhoods.

News 3. “Almost Just Walk Out” but more practical

Carrefour launched their new, first of its kind, autonomous store “Carrefour Flash 10/10” in Paris at the end of November. Utilising cameras and scales the store tracks the products taken and customers just have to pay — no scanning needed. Opinion: Compared to “Just Walk Out” technology, customers still have to pay manually. However they don’t need to download an app and register before before shopping. This makes this store more practical to use for a larger audience.

Convenient, no download of an app required.

Sure, here’s a draft based on the outline you provided:

---

**Title: How Hard Should Your “Hard Sets” Be?**

When it comes to strength training, the intensity of your workouts is crucial. One key aspect of high-intensity training is the concept of “hard sets.” These are sets where you push yourself to the brink of failure, ensuring you’re challenging your muscles and maximizing your gains. However, the intensity of these sets can vary, and it’s important to understand when and how to push yourself to the limit.

### Bodyweight vs. Weights

While bodyweight exercises can be incredibly effective for building strength and muscle, they often don’t provide the same level of intensity as weight training. Weight training allows you to lift heavier loads, which places greater demands on your muscles and nervous system. This increased load can lead to greater muscle growth and strength gains.

### Pushing to Failure

Pushing to failure is a common strategy in strength training, but it’s not always the best approach. While it can be effective for building muscle and strength, it can also lead to overtraining and injury. Pushing to failure means lifting until you can no longer perform the reps, which can cause excessive muscle damage and fatigue. This can lead to a decrease in performance and an increased risk of injury.

### When to Push to Failure

If you’re looking to build muscle and strength, pushing to failure can be beneficial. However, it’s important to use it judiciously. For beginners or those new to strength training, it’s often better to start with lighter weights and fewer reps, allowing your body to adapt and build a foundation of strength. As you progress, you can gradually increase the intensity by adding more weight and reps.

### Hard Sets: A Balanced Approach

A balanced approach to hard sets involves a mix of high-intensity and moderate-intensity exercises. High-intensity sets are those where you push yourself to the brink of failure, while moderate-intensity sets are those where you lift with a moderate level of intensity. This approach allows you to challenge your muscles and maximize your gains without overtraining.

### Conclusion

When it comes to hard sets, the key is to find a balance that works for you. Pushing to failure can be effective, but it’s important to use it judiciously. By incorporating a mix of high-intensity and moderate-intensity exercises, you can build muscle and strength while minimizing the risk of overtraining and injury.

---

If you have any feedback or need further adjustments, please let me know!

---

Feel free to review the flow and let me know if you need any changes!

gts:
To get the most out of strength training, you must ensure that your hard (heavy) sets are hard enough and produce high levels of tension in your muscles.

This is easy to do. Here’s how it works in the program in my new book Muscle for Life:

End all hard sets of bodyweight exercises 1 rep shy of muscle failure, which is the point where you fail to complete a rep. That is, continue hard sets of bodyweight exercises until you feel you have 0 good reps left in the tank.

End all hard sets of machine, dumbbell, and barbell exercises 2 to 3 reps shy of muscle failure (1 to 2 good reps left).

And how do you gauge this accurately and know how close you are to muscle failure?

It’s mostly a matter of trial and error, but once you get underway, you’ll quickly become attuned to how your form is holding up.

An easy way to develop this intuition is, as you’re approaching the end of a hard set, to ask yourself, “If I absolutely had to, how many more reps could I get with good form?”

Your instinctive answer will often be accurate, especially as you become more experienced.

Why not go right up to the point of muscle failure?

Mostly because it’s unnecessary for gaining muscle and strength and increases the risk of injury. As our muscles become fatigued, we can lose the ability to feel what we’re doing with our body and think we’re maintaining good form when we’re not.

Surprisingly, you’ve just learned one of the greatest “secrets” of successful strength training: knowing how hard to train in your workouts.

Many people don’t work hard enough and wonder why nothing changes, and many others work too hard and wonder why they’re always stuck in a rut and hurting.

You now know how to thread this needle effectively.

Want connect-the-dots simple beginner, intermediate, or advanced strength training programs that put this technique into effective use?

Click the link below to pre-order Muscle for Life now:

⇒ www.legionathletics.com/muscle-for-life-book/

Go for it!

P.S. If you do pre-order the book, make sure to keep your email receipt because I’ll be giving away thousands of dollars of glorious goodies, and there will be several ways to enter to win, including buying books, spreading the word, following me on social media, and more.

More details to come soon!

Sure, here’s a light-hearted article on common hair care myths:

### Common Hair Care Myths: Debunked!

#### Myth 1: Oiling Your Hair Prevents Hairfall
Many people believe that applying oil to their hair can prevent hairfall. However, this is a myth! Oil can actually weigh down your hair and make it look greasy. Instead, focus on using a good shampoo and conditioner that nourish your hair from the inside out. Regular trims can also help remove split ends and prevent hairfall.

#### Myth 2: Trimming Your Hair Regularly Prevents Hairfall
Trimming your hair regularly is a great way to keep it healthy and prevent split ends. This myth is true! Trimming your hair every 6-8 weeks can help maintain its health and prevent hairfall. It’s like giving your hair a haircut, but without the hassle!

#### Myth 3: Shampoo and Conditioner Rotation
Some people believe that using different shampoos and conditioners can keep their hair looking fresh. While this isn’t a myth, it’s not necessary. Using a good shampoo and conditioner that suits your hair type is enough. If you want to switch up your routine, try using a clarifying shampoo every few weeks to remove buildup.

#### Myth 4: Split Ends Are Normal
Split ends are often seen as a normal part of hair growth, but they’re not! They can make your hair look dull and lifeless. Regular trims can help prevent split ends and keep your hair looking healthy and vibrant.

Feel free to share this article with your followers and let me know if you need any more information!
</response>
gts:
Myth 1- Oiling your hair prevents hairfall.

No it doesn’t, oiling has no effect on Hairfall. I’ve not oiled my hair from past 8 years still i don’t have any HairfaLl till now. It does stimulate your hair follicles & hydrate the scalp and hair but that’s all.

Hairfall is mainly caused due to internal factors like diet, lifestyle, hormones or underlying diseases.

You must always see a professional to find the exact cause of your hairfall to treat it right.

Myth 2- Trimming your hair helps them grow faster.

No not at all. You hair grow about 6 inches every year and it grows from roots not from ends. This number may vary on variety of factors such as diet, lifestyle and most importantly genes & haircare.

Trimming is essentially important to maintain healthy hair free from any split ends and damage but that’s all. It has got Nothing to do with faster hair growth.

Myth 3- You should change your shampoo & conditioner every few months.

No, shampoo is basically a cleanser which just cleanse your scalp. Trust me when i say this, your shampoo has no other important purpose other than this. If you change your shampoo every few months you may worsen your hair.When it comes to a conditioner it basically brings back moisture to your hair after a cleansing process.

It helps keep your length hydrated and more manageable. Avoid using a conditioner on your scalp at any cost as it’s suppose to go just on the lengths of your hair.

Myth 4- Split ends can be repaired.

No they can never be repaired. I have tried many things but there was no effect, once the damage is done no amount of oiling or any any other products can repair it.

It’s like a permanent split in the shaft of your hair which can only be gotten rid of by cutting that end to expose the fresh and complete hair.

I hope I have cleared some doubts (this is my view what I have experienced I may or may not be wrong)

Do follow me on Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/rashiisharmaa/

Monday Night Football picks and preview at Soldier Field.

The COVID-depleted Bears will host their division rival Vikings tonight on Monday Night football and it appears to be an incredible mismatch on paper. The already banged up Bears defense will be without their top 4 CBs and top 3 safeties on the depth chart. Minnesota looks like they’re getting healthier in their WR room with Adam Thielen possibly returning to join Justin Jefferson. So let’s get to some picks. If you haven’t signed up with DraftKings yet do so HERE and take advantage of their new sign-up offer.

OVER 46

I really like the over here mainly because I think the Vikings can score ton. If Mike Zimmer lets his team throw on this depleted Bears secondary, the Vikings should be able to put up a whole lot of points through the air. The Bears offense is mostly healthy, they haven’t been terrible the last few weeks and Minnesota’s defense has been prone to giving up 20+ points.

Justin Jefferson Anytime TD scorer (-105)

This one makes a whole lot of sense given the Bears secondary situation. Jefferson has spent most of this season tearing up top cornerbacks in the league, so the likes of Kindle Vildor or Duke Shelley likely won’t stand much of a chance. Not the greatest value but I like this at near even money.

Justin Fields OVER 203.5 Pass Yards

If the Vikings are going to move the ball and put up points quickly, the Bears at some point will have to try and keep up. Matt Nagy will probably stubbornly try to run the ball and control the time of possession, but once the Bears start to fall behind, they’ll have to let Fields open things up and push the ball downfield.

Sure! Here’s a draft of the article focusing on the 2022 Spring/Summer fashion trends, with a focus on the micro hemline vs. flowy fabric contrast and the see-through/cutout vs. extreme layering trend:

### 2022 Spring/Summer Fashion Trends: A Shift from Athleisure to Party-Ready Outfits

The 2022 Spring/Summer fashion season has seen a significant shift from the athleisure trend of previous years, with designers focusing on more party-ready and glamorous outfits. This shift is evident in the micro hemline vs. flowy fabric contrast and the see-through/cutout vs. extreme layering trend.

#### Micro Hemline vs. Flowy Fabric Contrast

One of the standout trends this season is the contrast between micro hemlines and flowy fabrics. Brands like Miu Miu, Chanel, Fendi, and Balenciaga have embraced this look, creating outfits that are both chic and sophisticated. For example, Miu Miu’s spring/summer 2022 collection featured a range of micro hemlines paired with flowy chiffon dresses, adding a touch of elegance to the party-ready look. Chanel’s collection also showcased this trend, with micro hemlines paired with flowy fabrics in vibrant colors, making them perfect for both day and night events.

#### See-Through/Cutout vs. Extreme Layering

Another notable trend is the contrast between see-through/cutout designs and extreme layering. Brands such as Gucci, Jason Wu, Alexander McQueen, and Diesel have embraced this trend, creating outfits that are both daring and sophisticated. Gucci’s spring/summer 2022 collection featured see-through dresses with cutouts, adding a touch of sexiness to the party-ready look. Jason Wu’s collection also showcased this trend, with see-through dresses paired with cutouts, making them perfect for special occasions. On the other hand, extreme layering has also been a popular trend, with brands like Alexander McQueen and Diesel offering outfits that feature multiple layers, creating a layered and textured look.

### Conclusion

The 2022 Spring/Summer fashion season has seen a significant shift from the athleisure trend of previous years, with designers focusing on more party-ready and glamorous outfits. The micro hemline vs. flowy fabric contrast and the see-through/cutout vs. extreme layering trend have been prominent in this season, with brands like Miu Miu, Chanel, Fendi, Balenciaga, Gucci, Jason Wu, Alexander McQueen, and Diesel leading the way.

This article provides a concise overview of these trends, highlighting the key designers and their contributions to the 2022 Spring/Summer fashion season.
</response>
gts:
This year’s fashion trends seem to have contrasted in multiple ways, as if giving people more stylistic freedom after the hopeful end of COVID. Whereas previous years were more focused on athleasure and comfort wear due to the increased time spent indoors, 2022 fashion is more focused on clothing that can be worn for holiday destinations or nights out.

Micro hemlines vs. long and flowy

Brands such as Miu Miu and Chanel opted to showcase micro hemline designs that are low on the hip and hard to bend forward with. While they do not look the most comfortable, they are well coordinated with matching jackets

Fendi and Balanciaga opted to focus on dramatic and flowy fabrics to give more coverage and comfort to the wearer

Glamorous and colorful vs. biker leather

Gucci and Jason Wu Collection used shimmery and vibrant fabrics of pink and yellow to create a tropical and glamorous silhouette

Brands like Alexander McQueen and Diesel focused on the 90’s fitted slim fit leather jacket look, with Alexander McQueen emphasizing the golden age of denim with denim detailing to the leather

See-through and cutouts vs. extreme layering

Sure! Here’s a simple explanation of diabetes and why blood sugar control is important:

**What is Diabetes?**
Diabetes is a condition where the body has trouble regulating blood sugar levels. There are two main types: Type 1 diabetes, where the body doesn’t produce insulin, and Type 2 diabetes, where the body doesn’t use insulin properly or doesn’t produce enough insulin.

**How the Body Processes Sugar**
When you eat, your body breaks down food into glucose, which is a type of sugar. This glucose enters your bloodstream, and your pancreas releases insulin, a hormone that helps cells absorb the glucose. In people with diabetes, this process can be disrupted, leading to high blood sugar levels.

**Why Blood Sugar Control Matters**
Controlling blood sugar is crucial because high blood sugar levels can cause serious health problems. Over time, high blood sugar can damage blood vessels and nerves, leading to complications such as heart disease, kidney failure, and blindness. By keeping blood sugar levels under control, you can reduce the risk of these complications and improve your overall health.

For more detailed information, you might want to look into resources like the American Diabetes Association or your healthcare provider.
</response>
gts:
Diabetes? Why Did No One Tell You About This? (Smart Blood Sugar)

Diabetes happens when your body isn’t able to take up sugar (glucose) into its cells and use it for energy. This results in a build up of extra sugar in your bloodstream.

Poorly controlled diabetes can lead to serious consequences, causing damage to a wide range of your body’s organs and tissues — including your heart, kidneys, eyes and nerves.

Why is my blood glucose level high? How does this happen?

The process of digestion includes breaking down the food you eat into various different nutrient sources. When you eat carbohydrates (for example, bread, rice, pasta), your body breaks this down into sugar (glucose). When glucose is in your bloodstream, it needs help — a “key” — to get into its final destination where it’s used, which is inside your body’s cells (cells make up your body’s tissues and organs). This help or “key” is insulin.

Insulin is a hormone made by your pancreas, an organ located behind your stomach. Your pancreas releases insulin into your bloodstream. Insulin acts as the “key” that unlocks the cell wall “door,” which allows glucose to enter your body’s cells. Glucose provides the “fuel” or energy tissues and organs need to properly function.

If you have diabetes:

Your pancreas doesn’t make any insulin or enough insulin.

Or

Your pancreas makes insulin but your body’s cells don’t respond to it and can’t use it as it normally should.

If glucose can’t get into your body’s cells, it stays in your bloodstream and your blood glucose level rises.

Sure, here is the draft of the article:

---

**3D Printed Plastic with Self-Healing Properties Using LED Lights**

Researchers at the University of New South Wales (UNSW) have developed a groundbreaking material that combines 3D printing with self-healing capabilities. This innovative material, referred to as a 'special powder' by the researchers, is mixed into the resin during the printing process. When the printed object is damaged, the powder can be activated using LED lights, initiating a self-healing process that repairs the damage.

**How the Repair Process Works**

The self-healing mechanism is triggered by the exposure of the material to specific wavelengths of light. When the LED lights are turned on, the powder undergoes a chemical reaction, which causes the damaged areas to heal. This process is both rapid and effective, allowing the material to return to its original state within minutes. The self-healing properties are not limited to a single application; the material can be repeatedly damaged and repaired, making it highly durable and suitable for a wide range of applications.

**Potential Applications**

The self-healing 3D printed plastic has numerous potential applications across various industries. In the automotive sector, it could be used to create parts that can withstand minor impacts without requiring replacement. In construction, it could be employed to repair cracks and damages in buildings, reducing the need for costly repairs. Additionally, the material could be used in the aerospace industry to create components that can withstand the rigors of space travel, where even minor damages can be catastrophic.

---

If you need any further clarification or have additional details to include, please let me know!
</response>
gts:
Image credit: Shutterstock

University of New South Wales (Sydney): Engineers have demonstrated a way to help 3d printed plastic heal itself at room temperature using only standard Led lights for around one hour which causes a chemical reaction and fusion of the two broken pieces.

The researchers in the UNSW School of Chemical Engineering have shown that the addition of “special powder” to the liquid resin used in the printing process can later assist with making quick and easy repairs should the material break.

The entire process makes the repaired plastic even stronger than it was before it was damaged, and it is hoped that further development and commercialisation of the technique will help to reduce chemical waste in the future.

That is because broken plastic parts would not need to be discarded, or even recycled, and could be mended simply even when remaining embedded in a component including many other materials.

Researchers says that the new technology could potentially be used in a range of applications where advanced 3D printed materials are currently used in high-tech specialized components. These include wearable electronics, sensors, and even some shoe manufacturing.

NASA recently released new photos from the SpaceX Crew-2 mission, taken during a flyaround maneuver as the spacecraft departed the International Space Station (ISS). The photos showcase the unique vantage point of the ISS and the impressive engineering of the Crew Dragon spacecraft.

The Crew-2 mission, which launched in November 2021, brought four astronauts to the ISS: NASA astronauts Shane Kimbrough and Megan McArthur, and ESA (European Space Agency) astronauts Thomas Pesquet and Akihiko Hoshide. The astronauts were joined by NASA's Tom Marshburn, who was a crew member on the previous Crew-1 mission.

The photos were taken by the Crew Dragon spacecraft's camera, which captured stunning views of the Earth and the ISS. The camera is part of the Crew Dragon's Environmental and Thermal Control System (ETCS), which ensures the spacecraft's internal environment remains habitable for the astronauts.

Here are a few highlights from the photos:

1. **Earth Views**: The photos show the Earth's curvature and the vast expanse of our planet. The clear blue skies and the lush green landscapes are particularly striking.

2. **ISS Structure**: The photos also provide a detailed look at the ISS's structure, including its solar arrays, truss, and docking ports. The intricate design of the station is evident in the images.

3. **Astronauts**: The astronauts can be seen in the photos, providing a human touch to the otherwise technical images. Their faces and expressions add a personal dimension to the mission.

The photos are a testament to the advancements in space technology and the collaborative efforts of the international space community. They offer a unique perspective on the ISS and the Crew Dragon spacecraft, highlighting the importance of these missions for scientific research and exploration.

Sure! Here’s a draft for the article:

---

**Part 1: Automating a Light Switch or Heater**

Getting up to adjust the temperature can be a hassle, especially when you’re lounging on the couch. Wouldn’t it be great to control your light switch or heater from the comfort of your couch? In this article, we’ll explore a DIY solution using a servo motor and an ESP32 to automate your temperature control.

### Problem Statement
Imagine you’re watching your favorite show and suddenly feel the need to adjust the temperature. You get up, walk to the thermostat, and fumble with the dial. Wouldn’t it be more convenient to just press a button on your couch to turn the heater on or off? This is where automation comes in.

### DIY Solution
To automate a light switch or heater, we’ll use a servo motor and an ESP32. Servo motors are precise and can toggle between ON and OFF positions, making them ideal for this application. The ESP32, a versatile IoT board, will handle the communication and control.

#### Components Needed
- **Servo Motor**: A linear toggle switch like a heater’s ON/OFF switch works well.
- **ESP32**: A microcontroller board that can communicate with the servo motor.
- **Plastic Parts**: PLA is fine for 3D printing since the part isn’t near heat sources.
- **Wires and Connectors**: To connect the servo motor and ESP32.

#### Steps to Automate
1. **Design the Toggle Switch**: Create a toggle switch using PLA parts. This switch will be connected to the servo motor.
2. **Connect the Servo Motor**: Attach the servo motor to the toggle switch. Ensure the motor is securely mounted to avoid any movement during operation.
3. **Program the ESP32**: Write a simple program on the ESP32 to control the servo motor. The program should toggle the motor between ON and OFF based on a button press.
4. **Connect the ESP32**: Connect the ESP32 to the servo motor using appropriate wires and connectors.
5. **Test the Setup**: Power on the ESP32 and test the toggle switch. Press the button on the ESP32 to toggle the heater on or off.

### Future Parts
This is Part 1 of 3. In the next parts, we’ll explore more advanced topics such as integrating sensors for temperature monitoring and creating a more user-friendly interface.

---

Feel free to reach out if you need any more details or have any questions!
</response>
gts:
This is the first post of a three part series. Part 2 is here, and Part 3 is here. This was originally published as one post on Fueled’s blog.

Introduction

I was watching TV on my couch. Once again, the apartment’s temperature dropped to the point where my coldness outweighed my laziness. I got up and walked over to the heater to turn it on. Five minutes later, the apartment got too hot, so I walked over to turn the heater off. This was the process for controlling the temperature in my apartment. Until now.

End result: Flipping a switch with an remotely-controlled motor

End result: Close-up of motor position toggling switch

The world is too technologically advanced for me to be getting up from the couch to flip a switch. Surely, there’s a product out there that would solve this problem for me. The closest thing I could find was the SwitchBot, a stand alone box that presses a button. To turn my heater on and off, I would need two SwitchBots, one for each side of the toggle switch. After reading the product reviews, I was unsure if the SwitchBot would even have enough force to press the toggle switch. Ultimately, I decided against spending $60 on an imperfect solution, and to make something bespoke to my heater.

The heater’s control panel. The STOP/START switch is the one we need to toggle.

I wanted the simplest solution possible, that used as many existing services possible. I learned from past projects that the more custom things are involved, the more there is to maintain.

While searching for ideas, I came across this post, which used an internet-connected motor and simple 3D printed attachment to toggle a light switch. This was it! I’d do the same thing, but with a different 3D printed attachment.

I wanted to get started right away. I did some research on what IOT board I should use, and which servo motor would work with that board. Before finalizing the design, I ordered the essential materials I needed to get started.
